  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 11 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 12 |
 13 |out vec4 fragColor;
 14 |
 15 |void main() { 
 16 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 17 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 18 |    float alpha = 0.0f;
 19 |
 20 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 21 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 22 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 23 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 24 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 25 |
 26 |    if (unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z<0.5f)
 27 |    {
 28 |    aplha=1.0f;
 29 |    }
 30 |
 31 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
 32 |
 33 |}
 34 |

[Mon Mar 30 19:05:30 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(19) : error C7011: implicit cast from "vec4" to "vec3"

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 11 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 12 |
 13 |out vec4 fragColor;
 14 |
 15 |void main() { 
 16 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 17 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 18 |    vec3 gray = vec3(0.3,0.59,0.11);
 19 |    float alpha = dot(unit0,gray);
 20 |
 21 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 22 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 23 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 24 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 25 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 26 |
 27 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 28 |
 29 |    if (sum<=0.05f)
 30 |    {
 31 |    alpha=1.0f;
 32 |    }
 33 |
 34 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
 35 |
 36 |}
 37 |

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 11 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 12 |
 13 |out vec4 fragColor;
 14 |
 15 |void main() { 
 16 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 17 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 18 |    vec3 gray = vec3(0.3,0.59,0.11);
 19 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,gray);
 20 |
 21 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 22 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 23 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 24 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 25 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 26 |
 27 |    alpha*=2;
 28 |    alpha=alpha>1?1.0f:alpha;
 29 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 30 |
 31 |    if (unit0.x<=0.2&&unit0.y<=0.2**unit0.z<=0.2)
 32 |    {
 33 |    alpha=1.0f;
 34 |    }
 35 |
 36 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
 37 |
 38 |}
 39 |

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 11 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 12 |
 13 |out vec4 fragColor;
 14 |
 15 |void main() { 
 16 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 17 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 18 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 19 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 20 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 21 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 22 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 23 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 24 |
 25 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 26 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 27 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 28 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 29 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 30 |
 31 |    alpha*=2;
 32 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 33 |
 34 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 35 |
 36 |    if (sum<=0.15||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blk)
 37 |    {
 38 |    discard;
 39 |    }
 40 |
 41 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
 42 |
 43 |}
 44 |

[Tue Mar 31 18:14:55 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(49) : error C7011: implicit cast from "vec4" to "vec3"

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |
 12 |uniform float u_time;
 13 |
 14 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 15 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 16 |
 17 |out vec4 fragColor;
 18 |
 19 |void main() { 
 20 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 21 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 22 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 23 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 24 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 25 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 26 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 27 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 28 |
 29 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 30 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 31 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 32 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 33 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 34 |
 35 |    alpha*=10;
 36 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 37 |    alpha=alpha<0?0.0f:alpha;
 38 |
 39 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 40 |
 41 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 42 |    {
 43 |    discard;
 44 |    }
 45 |
 46 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
 47 |  if (swapColor==1)
 48 |  {
 49 |  fragColor=vec4(unit0*gry,alpha);
 50 |  }
 51 |}
 52 |

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform GLint swapColor;
 11 |
 12 |uniform float u_time;
 13 |
 14 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 15 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 16 |
 17 |out vec4 fragColor;
 18 |
 19 |void main() { 
 20 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 21 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 22 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 23 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 24 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 25 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 26 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 27 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 28 |
 29 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 30 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 31 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 32 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 33 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 34 |
 35 |    alpha*=10;
 36 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 37 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 38 |
 39 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 40 |
 41 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 42 |    {
 43 |    discard;
 44 |    }
 45 |
 46 |  if (swapColor==1)
 47 |  {
 48 |    unit0*=vec4(gry,1);
 49 |  }
 50 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
 51 |}
 52 |

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform float swapColor;
 11 |
 12 |uniform float u_time;
 13 |
 14 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 15 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 16 |
 17 |out vec4 fragColor;
 18 |
 19 |void main() { 
 20 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 21 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 22 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 23 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 24 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 25 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 26 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 27 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 28 |
 29 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 30 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 31 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 32 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 33 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 34 |
 35 |    alpha*=10;
 36 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 37 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 38 |
 39 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 40 |
 41 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 42 |    {
 43 |    discard;
 44 |    }
 45 |
 46 |  if (swapColor==1)
 47 |  {
 48 |    unit0*=vec4(gry,1);
 49 |  }
 50 |  //fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
 51 |  fragColor = vec4(swapColor, 1);
 52 |}
 53 |

[Tue Mar 31 21:56:17 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
[Tue Mar 31 21:56:17 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(64) : error C7011: implicit cast from "float" to "int"

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform float swapColor;
 11 |
 12 |uniform float u_time;
 13 |
 14 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 15 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 16 |
 17 |out vec4 fragColor;
 18 |
 19 |void main() { 
 20 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 21 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 22 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 23 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 24 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 25 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 26 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 27 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 28 |
 29 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 30 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 31 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 32 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 33 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 34 |
 35 |    alpha*=10;
 36 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 37 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 38 |
 39 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 40 |
 41 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 42 |    {
 43 |    discard;
 44 |    }
 45 |
 46 |  switch(swapColor)
 47 |  {
 48 |  case 0:
 49 |    break;
 50 |  case 1:
 51 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
 52 |    break;
 53 |  case 2:
 54 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
 55 |    break;
 56 |  case 3:
 57 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0,1,0),1);
 58 |    break;
 59 |  case 4:
 60 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0,0,1),1);
 61 |    break;
 62 |  default:
 63 |    break;
 64 |  }
 65 |
 66 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
 67 |}
 68 |

[Tue Mar 31 21:56:41 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
[Tue Mar 31 21:56:41 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(64) : error C7011: implicit cast from "float" to "int"

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform float swapColor;
 11 |
 12 |uniform float u_time;
 13 |
 14 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 15 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 16 |
 17 |out vec4 fragColor;
 18 |
 19 |void main() { 
 20 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 21 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 22 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 23 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 24 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 25 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 26 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 27 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 28 |
 29 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 30 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 31 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 32 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 33 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 34 |
 35 |    alpha*=10;
 36 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 37 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 38 |
 39 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 40 |
 41 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 42 |    {
 43 |    discard;
 44 |    }
 45 |
 46 |  switch(swapColor)
 47 |  {
 48 |  case 0:
 49 |    break;
 50 |  case 1:
 51 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
 52 |    break;
 53 |  case 2:
 54 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
 55 |    break;
 56 |  case 3:
 57 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0,1,0),1);
 58 |    break;
 59 |  case 4:
 60 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0,0,1),1);
 61 |    break;
 62 |  default:
 63 |    break;
 64 |  };
 65 |
 66 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
 67 |}
 68 |

0(46) : error C7563: assignment to uniform swapColor
0(65) : error C7011: implicit cast from "float" to "int"

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform float swapColor;
 11 |
 12 |uniform float u_time;
 13 |
 14 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 15 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 16 |
 17 |out vec4 fragColor;
 18 |
 19 |void main() { 
 20 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 21 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 22 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 23 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 24 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 25 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 26 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 27 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 28 |
 29 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 30 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 31 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 32 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 33 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 34 |
 35 |    alpha*=10;
 36 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 37 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 38 |
 39 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 40 |
 41 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 42 |    {
 43 |    discard;
 44 |    }
 45 |
 46 |    swapColor=(int)swapColor;
 47 |  switch(swapColor)
 48 |  {
 49 |  case 0:
 50 |    break;
 51 |  case 1:
 52 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
 53 |    break;
 54 |  case 2:
 55 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
 56 |    break;
 57 |  case 3:
 58 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0,1,0),1);
 59 |    break;
 60 |  case 4:
 61 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0,0,1),1);
 62 |    break;
 63 |  default:
 64 |    break;
 65 |  };
 66 |
 67 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
 68 |}
 69 |

 21 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 22 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 23 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 24 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 25 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 26 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 27 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 28 |
 29 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 30 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 31 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 32 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 33 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 34 |
 35 |    alpha*=10;
 36 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 37 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 38 |

 40 |
 41 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 42 |    {
 43 |    discard;
 44 |    }
 45 |
 46 |    swapColor=int(swapColor);
 47 |  switch(swapColor)
 48 |  {
 49 |  case 0:
 50 |    break;

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform float swapColor;
 11 |
 12 |uniform float u_time;
 13 |
 14 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 15 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 16 |
 17 |out vec4 fragColor;
 18 |
 19 |void main() { 
 20 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 21 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 22 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 23 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 24 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 25 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 26 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 27 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 28 |
 29 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 30 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 31 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 32 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 33 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 34 |
 35 |    alpha*=10;
 36 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 37 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 38 |
 39 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 40 |
 41 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 42 |    {
 43 |    discard;
 44 |    }
 45 |
 46 |    swapColor=swapColor%1;
 47 |
 48 |  switch(swapColor)
 49 |  {
 50 |  case 0:
 51 |    break;
 52 |  case 1:
 53 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
 54 |    break;
 55 |  case 2:
 56 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
 57 |    break;
 58 |  case 3:
 59 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0,1,0),1);
 60 |    break;
 61 |  case 4:
 62 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0,0,1),1);
 63 |    break;
 64 |  default:
 65 |    break;
 66 |  };
 67 |
 68 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
 69 |}
 70 |

[Tue Mar 31 22:23:55 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(75) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected ')', expecting "::" at token ")"
0(103) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected '=', expecting "::" at token "="

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform float swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |
 13 |uniform float u_time;
 14 |
 15 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 16 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 17 |
 18 |out vec4 fragColor;
 19 |
 20 |void main() { 
 21 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 22 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 23 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 24 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 25 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 26 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 27 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 28 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 29 |
 30 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 31 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 32 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 33 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 34 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 35 |
 36 |    alpha*=10;
 37 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 38 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 39 |
 40 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 41 |
 42 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 43 |    {
 44 |    discard;
 45 |    }
 46 |
 47 |    int new =int(swapColor);
 48 |
 49 |  switch(new)
 50 |  {
 51 |  case 0:
 52 |    break;
 53 |  case 1:
 54 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
 55 |    break;
 56 |  case 2:
 57 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
 58 |    break;
 59 |  case 3:
 60 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
 61 |    break;
 62 |  case 4:
 63 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.6,0.4,0.4),1);
 64 |    break;
 65 |  case 5:
 66 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.6,0.6,0.6),1);
 67 |    break;
 68 |  case 6:
 69 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
 70 |    break;
 71 |  default:
 72 |    break;
 73 |  };
 74 |
 75 |  bool flag = bool()TVflag;
 76 |  if flag
 77 |  {
 78 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 79 |  unit0*=bw;
 80 |    vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
 81 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
 82 |  switch(line)
 83 |  {
 84 |  case 0:
 85 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
 86 |    break;
 87 |  case 1:
 88 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
 89 |    break;
 90 |  case 2:
 91 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
 92 |    break;
 93 |  case 3:
 94 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
 95 |    break;
 96 |  default:
 97 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
 98 |    break;
 99 |  };
100 |  };
101 |
102 |
103 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
104 |}
105 |

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform float swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |
 13 |uniform float u_time;
 14 |
 15 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 16 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 17 |
 18 |out vec4 fragColor;
 19 |
 20 |void main() { 
 21 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 22 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 23 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 24 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 25 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 26 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 27 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 28 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 29 |
 30 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 31 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 32 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 33 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 34 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 35 |
 36 |    alpha*=10;
 37 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 38 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 39 |
 40 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 41 |
 42 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 43 |    {
 44 |    discard;
 45 |    }
 46 |
 47 |    int new =int(swapColor);
 48 |
 49 |  switch(new)
 50 |  {
 51 |  case 0:
 52 |    break;
 53 |  case 1:
 54 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
 55 |    break;
 56 |  case 2:
 57 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
 58 |    break;
 59 |  case 3:
 60 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
 61 |    break;
 62 |  case 4:
 63 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.6,0.4,0.4),1);
 64 |    break;
 65 |  case 5:
 66 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.6,0.6,0.6),1);
 67 |    break;
 68 |  case 6:
 69 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
 70 |    break;
 71 |  default:
 72 |    break;
 73 |  };
 74 |
 75 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
 76 |  if flag
 77 |  {
 78 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 79 |  unit0*=bw;
 80 |    vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
 81 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
 82 |  switch(line)
 83 |  {
 84 |  case 0:
 85 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
 86 |    break;

 89 |    break;

 98 |    break;
 99 |  };
100 |  };

  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform float swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |
 13 |uniform float u_time;
 14 |
 15 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 16 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 17 |
 18 |out vec4 fragColor;
 19 |
 20 |void main() { 
 21 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 22 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 23 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 24 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 25 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 26 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 27 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 28 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 29 |
 30 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 31 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 32 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 33 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 34 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 35 |
 36 |    alpha*=10;
 37 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 38 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 39 |
 40 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 41 |
 42 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 43 |    {
 44 |    discard;
 45 |    }
 46 |
 47 |    int new =int(swapColor);
 48 |
 49 |  switch(new)
 50 |  {
 51 |  case 0:
 52 |    break;
 53 |  case 1:
 54 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
 55 |    break;
 56 |  case 2:
 57 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
 58 |    break;
 59 |  case 3:
 60 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
 61 |    break;
 62 |  case 4:
 63 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.6,0.4,0.4),1);
 64 |    break;
 65 |  case 5:
 66 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.6,0.6,0.6),1);
 67 |    break;
 68 |  case 6:
 69 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
 70 |    break;
 71 |  default:
 72 |    break;
 73 |  };
 74 |
 75 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
 76 |  if (flag)
 77 |  {
 78 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 79 |  unit0*=bw;
 80 |    vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
 81 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
 82 |  switch(line)
 83 |  {
 84 |  case 0:
 85 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
 86 |    break;
 87 |  case 1:
 88 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
 89 |    break;

 92 |    break;

 96 |  default:

 98 |    break;
 99 |  };
100 |  };

104 |}

[Mon Apr  6 17:41:53 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(71) : error C7011: implicit cast from "float" to "int"

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 420 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform float swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |
 14 |uniform float u_time;
 15 |
 16 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 17 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 18 |
 19 |out vec4 fragColor;
 20 |
 21 |void main() { 
 22 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 23 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 24 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 25 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 26 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 27 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 28 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 29 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 30 |
 31 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 32 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 33 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 34 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 35 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 36 |
 37 |    alpha*=10;
 38 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 39 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 40 |
 41 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 42 |
 43 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 44 |    {
 45 |    discard;
 46 |    }
 47 |  switch(swapColor)
 48 |  {
 49 |  case 0:
 50 |    break;
 51 |  case 1:
 52 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
 53 |    break;
 54 |  case 2:
 55 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
 56 |    break;
 57 |  case 3:
 58 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
 59 |    break;
 60 |  case 4:
 61 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
 62 |    break;
 63 |  case 5:
 64 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
 65 |    break;
 66 |  case 6:
 67 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
 68 |    break;
 69 |  default:
 70 |    break;
 71 |  };
 72 |
 73 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
 74 |  if (flag)
 75 |  {
 76 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 77 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
 78 |    vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
 79 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
 80 |  switch(line)
 81 |  {
 82 |  case 0:
 83 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
 84 |    break;
 85 |  case 1:
 86 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
 87 |    break;
 88 |  case 2:
 89 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
 90 |    break;
 91 |  case 3:
 92 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
 93 |    break;
 94 |  default:
 95 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
 96 |    break;
 97 |  };
 98 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
 99 |  };
100 |
101 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
102 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
103 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
104 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
105 |}
106 |

[Sun Apr 19 15:17:51 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p5-2/textureReplace.vert
[Sun Apr 19 15:17:51 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
[Sun Apr 19 15:17:51 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(26) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected '=', expecting "::" at token "="

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |
 14 |uniform float u_time;
 15 |
 16 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 17 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 18 |
 19 |out vec4 fragColor;
 20 |
 21 |vec4 chaosFunc (vec4 uni)
 22 |{
 23 |    if (true)
 24 |    {
 25 |        float r = 3.759816;
 26 |        floar chaos = r*x(x-1)*255;
 27 |        uni.x*=chaos;
 28 |        uni.y*=chaos;
 29 |        uni.z*=chaos;
 30 |        uni.w*=chaos;
 31 |    }
 32 |    return uni;
 33 |}
 34 |
 35 |void main() { 
 36 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 37 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 38 |    unit0 = chaosFunc(unit0);
 39 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 40 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 41 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 42 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 43 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 44 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 45 |
 46 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 47 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 48 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 49 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 50 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 51 |
 52 |    alpha*=10;
 53 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 54 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 55 |
 56 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 57 |
 58 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 59 |    {
 60 |    discard;
 61 |    }
 62 |  switch(int(swapColor))
 63 |  {
 64 |  case 0:
 65 |    break;
 66 |  case 1:
 67 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
 68 |    break;
 69 |  case 2:
 70 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
 71 |    break;
 72 |  case 3:
 73 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
 74 |    break;
 75 |  case 4:
 76 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
 77 |    break;
 78 |  case 5:
 79 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
 80 |    break;
 81 |  case 6:
 82 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
 83 |    break;
 84 |  default:
 85 |    break;
 86 |  };
 87 |
 88 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
 89 |  if (flag)
 90 |  {
 91 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 92 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
 93 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
 94 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
 95 |  switch(line)
 96 |  {
 97 |  case 0:
 98 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
 99 |    break;
100 |  case 1:
101 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
102 |    break;
103 |  case 2:
104 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
105 |    break;
106 |  case 3:
107 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
108 |    break;
109 |  default:
110 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
111 |    break;
112 |  };
113 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
114 |  };
115 |
116 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
117 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
118 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
119 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
120 |}
121 |

[Sun Apr 19 15:18:17 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p5-2/textureReplace.vert
[Sun Apr 19 15:18:17 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
[Sun Apr 19 15:18:18 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(26) : error C1008: undefined variable "x"
0(26) : error C1008: undefined variable "x"

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |
 14 |uniform float u_time;
 15 |
 16 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 17 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 18 |
 19 |out vec4 fragColor;
 20 |
 21 |vec4 chaosFunc (vec4 uni)
 22 |{
 23 |    if (true)
 24 |    {
 25 |        float r = 3.759816;
 26 |        float chaos = r*x(x-1)*255;
 27 |        uni.x*=chaos;
 28 |        uni.y*=chaos;
 29 |        uni.z*=chaos;
 30 |        uni.w*=chaos;
 31 |    }
 32 |    return uni;
 33 |}
 34 |
 35 |void main() { 
 36 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 37 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 38 |    unit0 = chaosFunc(unit0);
 39 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 40 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 41 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 42 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 43 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 44 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 45 |
 46 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 47 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 48 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 49 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 50 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 51 |
 52 |    alpha*=10;
 53 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 54 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 55 |
 56 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 57 |
 58 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 59 |    {
 60 |    discard;
 61 |    }
 62 |  switch(int(swapColor))
 63 |  {
 64 |  case 0:
 65 |    break;
 66 |  case 1:
 67 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
 68 |    break;
 69 |  case 2:
 70 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
 71 |    break;
 72 |  case 3:
 73 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
 74 |    break;
 75 |  case 4:
 76 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
 77 |    break;
 78 |  case 5:
 79 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
 80 |    break;
 81 |  case 6:
 82 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
 83 |    break;
 84 |  default:
 85 |    break;
 86 |  };
 87 |
 88 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
 89 |  if (flag)
 90 |  {
 91 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 92 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
 93 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
 94 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
 95 |  switch(line)
 96 |  {
 97 |  case 0:
 98 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
 99 |    break;
100 |  case 1:
101 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
102 |    break;
103 |  case 2:
104 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
105 |    break;
106 |  case 3:
107 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
108 |    break;
109 |  default:
110 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
111 |    break;
112 |  };
113 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
114 |  };
115 |
116 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
117 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
118 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
119 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
120 |}
121 |

  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |
 14 |uniform float u_time;
 15 |
 16 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 17 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 18 |
 19 |out vec4 fragColor;
 20 |
 21 |vec4 chaosFunc (vec4 uni)
 22 |{
 23 |    if (true)
 24 |    {
 25 |        float x = 0.4f;
 26 |        float r = 3.759816;
 27 |        float chaos = r*x(x-1)*255;
 28 |        uni.x*=chaos;
 29 |        uni.y*=chaos;
 30 |        uni.z*=chaos;
 31 |        uni.w*=chaos;
 32 |    }
 33 |    return uni;
 34 |}
 35 |
 36 |void main() { 
 37 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 38 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 39 |    unit0 = chaosFunc(unit0);
 40 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 41 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 42 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 43 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 44 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 45 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 46 |
 47 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 48 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 49 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 50 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 51 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 52 |
 53 |    alpha*=10;
 54 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 55 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 56 |
 57 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 58 |
 59 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 60 |    {
 61 |    discard;
 62 |    }
 63 |  switch(int(swapColor))
 64 |  {
 65 |  case 0:
 66 |    break;
 67 |  case 1:
 68 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
 69 |    break;
 70 |  case 2:
 71 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
 72 |    break;
 73 |  case 3:
 74 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
 75 |    break;
 76 |  case 4:
 77 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
 78 |    break;
 79 |  case 5:
 80 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
 81 |    break;
 82 |  case 6:
 83 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
 84 |    break;
 85 |  default:
 86 |    break;
 87 |  };
 88 |
 89 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
 90 |  if (flag)
 91 |  {
 92 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 93 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
 94 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
 95 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
 96 |  switch(line)
 97 |  {
 98 |  case 0:
 99 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
100 |    break;

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |
 15 |uniform float u_time;
 16 |
 17 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 18 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 19 |
 20 |out vec4 fragColor;
 21 |
 22 |float chaosFunc (x)
 23 |{
 24 |    //if (true)
 25 |    {
 26 |        //float x = timeV;
 27 |        float r = 3.759816;
 28 |        float chaos = r*x*(x-1);
 29 |        //uni.x=chaos;
 30 |        //uni.y=chaos;
 31 |        //uni.z=chaos;
 32 |        //uni.w=chaos;
 33 |    }
 34 |    return chaos;
 35 |}
 36 |
 37 |float rand(vec2 n) { 
 38 |	return fract(sin(dot(n, vec2(12.9898, 4.1414))) * 43758.5453);
 39 |}
 40 |
 41 |float noise(vec2 p){
 42 |	vec2 ip = floor(p);
 43 |	vec2 u = fract(p);
 44 |	u = u*u*(3.0-2.0*u);
 45 |	
 46 |	float res = mix(
 47 |		mix(rand(ip),rand(ip+vec2(1.0,0.0)),u.x),
 48 |		mix(rand(ip+vec2(0.0,1.0)),rand(ip+vec2(1.0,1.0)),u.x),u.y);
 49 |	return res*res;
 50 |}
 51 |
 52 |void main() { 
 53 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 54 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 55 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 56 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 57 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 58 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 59 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 60 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 61 |
 62 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 63 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 64 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 65 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 66 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 67 |
 68 |    alpha*=10;
 69 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 70 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 71 |
 72 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 73 |
 74 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 75 |    {
 76 |    discard;
 77 |    }
 78 |  switch(int(swapColor))
 79 |  {
 80 |  case 0:
 81 |    break;
 82 |  case 1:
 83 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
 84 |    break;
 85 |  case 2:
 86 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
 87 |    break;
 88 |  case 3:
 89 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
 90 |    break;
 91 |  case 4:
 92 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
 93 |    break;
 94 |  case 5:
 95 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
 96 |    break;
 97 |  case 6:
 98 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
 99 |    break;
100 |  default:
101 |    break;
102 |  };
103 |
104 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
105 |  if (flag)
106 |  {
107 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
108 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
109 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
110 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
111 |  switch(line)
112 |  {
113 |  case 0:
114 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
115 |    break;
116 |  case 1:
117 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
118 |    break;
119 |  case 2:
120 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
121 |    break;
122 |  case 3:
123 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
124 |    break;
125 |  default:
126 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
127 |    break;
128 |  };
129 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
130 |  };
131 |
132 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
133 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
134 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
135 |  //unit0 = chaosFunc(unit0);
136 |  //unit0.x = rand(texCoordFrag);
137 |  //unit0.y = rand(texCoordFrag);
138 |  unit0.z = chaosFunc(timeV);
139 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
140 |}
141 |

[Sun Apr 19 16:06:51 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
[Sun Apr 19 16:06:51 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(126) : error C7011: implicit cast from "float" to "vec2"

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform bool noiseIO;
 15 |
 16 |uniform float u_time;
 17 |
 18 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 19 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 20 |
 21 |out vec4 fragColor;
 22 |
 23 |float chaosFunc (float x)
 24 |{
 25 |        //float x = timeV;
 26 |        float r = 3.759816;
 27 |        float chaos = r*x*(x-1);
 28 |        //uni.x=chaos;
 29 |        //uni.y=chaos;
 30 |        //uni.z=chaos;
 31 |        //uni.w=chaos;
 32 |    return chaos;
 33 |}
 34 |
 35 |float rand(vec2 n) { 
 36 |	return fract(sin(dot(n, vec2(12.9898, 4.1414))) * 43758.5453);
 37 |}
 38 |
 39 |void main() { 
 40 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 41 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 42 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 43 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 44 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 45 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 46 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 47 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 48 |
 49 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 50 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 51 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 52 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 53 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 54 |
 55 |    alpha*=10;
 56 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 57 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 58 |
 59 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 60 |
 61 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 62 |    {
 63 |    discard;
 64 |    }
 65 |  switch(int(swapColor))
 66 |  {
 67 |  case 0:
 68 |    break;
 69 |  case 1:
 70 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
 71 |    break;
 72 |  case 2:
 73 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
 74 |    break;
 75 |  case 3:
 76 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
 77 |    break;
 78 |  case 4:
 79 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
 80 |    break;
 81 |  case 5:
 82 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
 83 |    break;
 84 |  case 6:
 85 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
 86 |    break;
 87 |  default:
 88 |    break;
 89 |  };
 90 |
 91 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
 92 |  if (flag)
 93 |  {
 94 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 95 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
 96 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
 97 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
 98 |  switch(line)
 99 |  {
100 |  case 0:
101 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
102 |    break;
103 |  case 1:
104 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
105 |    break;
106 |  case 2:
107 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
108 |    break;
109 |  case 3:
110 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
111 |    break;
112 |  default:
113 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
114 |    break;
115 |  };
116 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
117 |  };
118 |
119 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
120 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
121 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
122 |  if (noiseIO)
123 |  {
124 |  unit0.x = rand(texCoordFrag);
125 |  unit0.y = rand(texCoordFrag);
126 |  unit0.z = rand(timeV);
127 |  }
128 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
129 |}
130 |

[Sun Apr 19 21:15:26 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(136) : error C7565: assignment to varying 'texCoordFrag'

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform bool noiseIO;
 15 |
 16 |uniform float u_time;
 17 |
 18 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 19 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 20 |
 21 |out vec4 fragColor;
 22 |
 23 |float chaosFunc (float x)
 24 |{
 25 |    float r = 3.759816;
 26 |    float chaos = r*x*(x-1);
 27 |    return chaos;
 28 |}
 29 |
 30 |float rand(vec2 n) { 
 31 |	return fract(sin(dot(n, vec2(12.9898, 4.1414))) * 43758.5453);
 32 |}
 33 |
 34 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 35 |{
 36 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 37 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 38 |
 39 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 40 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 41 |
 42 |  return pct0+pct1;
 43 |}
 44 |
 45 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 46 |{
 47 |    p*=z;
 48 |    return fract(p);
 49 |}
 50 |
 51 |void main() { 
 52 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 53 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 54 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 55 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 56 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 57 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 58 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 59 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 60 |
 61 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 62 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 63 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 64 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 65 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 66 |
 67 |    alpha*=10;
 68 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 69 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 70 |
 71 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 72 |
 73 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 74 |    {
 75 |    discard;
 76 |    }
 77 |  switch(int(swapColor))
 78 |  {
 79 |  case 0:
 80 |    break;
 81 |  case 1:
 82 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
 83 |    break;
 84 |  case 2:
 85 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
 86 |    break;
 87 |  case 3:
 88 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
 89 |    break;
 90 |  case 4:
 91 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
 92 |    break;
 93 |  case 5:
 94 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
 95 |    break;
 96 |  case 6:
 97 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
 98 |    break;
 99 |  default:
100 |    break;
101 |  };
102 |
103 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
104 |  if (flag)
105 |  {
106 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
107 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
108 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
109 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
110 |  switch(line)
111 |  {
112 |  case 0:
113 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
114 |    break;
115 |  case 1:
116 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
117 |    break;
118 |  case 2:
119 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
120 |    break;
121 |  case 3:
122 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
123 |    break;
124 |  default:
125 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
126 |    break;
127 |  };
128 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
129 |  };
130 |
131 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
132 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
133 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
134 |  if (noiseIO)
135 |  {
136 |  texCoordFrag = tileF(texCoordFrag, 10);
137 |  unit0.x = star(texCoordFrag,0.02)*bright;
138 |  unit0.y = star(texCoordFrag,0.03)*bright;
139 |  unit0.z = star(texCoordFrag,0.04)*bright;
140 |  alpha = 1.0;
141 |  }
142 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
143 |}
144 |

[Sun Apr 19 21:24:30 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p5-2/textureReplace.vert
[Sun Apr 19 21:24:30 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
[Sun Apr 19 21:24:30 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(147) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected '=', expecting "::" at token "="

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform bool noiseIO;
 15 |
 16 |uniform float u_time;
 17 |
 18 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 19 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 20 |
 21 |out vec4 fragColor;
 22 |
 23 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 24 |{
 25 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 26 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 27 |
 28 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 29 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 30 |
 31 |  return pct0+pct1;
 32 |}
 33 |
 34 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 35 |{
 36 |    p*=z;
 37 |    return fract(p);
 38 |}
 39 |
 40 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 41 |    _st *= _zoom;
 42 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 43 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 44 |    }
 45 |    return fract(_st);
 46 |}
 47 |
 48 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 49 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 50 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 51 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
 52 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
 53 |}
 54 |
 55 |void main() { 
 56 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 57 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 58 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 59 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 60 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 61 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 62 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 63 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 64 |
 65 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 66 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 67 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 68 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 69 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 70 |
 71 |    alpha*=10;
 72 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 73 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 74 |
 75 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 76 |
 77 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 78 |    {
 79 |    discard;
 80 |    }
 81 |  switch(int(swapColor))
 82 |  {
 83 |  case 0:
 84 |    break;
 85 |  case 1:
 86 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
 87 |    break;
 88 |  case 2:
 89 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
 90 |    break;
 91 |  case 3:
 92 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
 93 |    break;
 94 |  case 4:
 95 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
 96 |    break;
 97 |  case 5:
 98 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
 99 |    break;
100 |  case 6:
101 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
102 |    break;
103 |  default:
104 |    break;
105 |  };
106 |
107 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
108 |  if (flag)
109 |  {
110 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
111 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
112 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
113 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
114 |  switch(line)
115 |  {
116 |  case 0:
117 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
118 |    break;
119 |  case 1:
120 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
121 |    break;
122 |  case 2:
123 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
124 |    break;
125 |  case 3:
126 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
127 |    break;
128 |  default:
129 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
130 |    break;
131 |  };
132 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
133 |  };
134 |
135 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
136 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
137 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
138 |  if (noiseIO)
139 |  {
140 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag
141 |  //col2 = tileF(col2, 10);
142 |  //unit0.x = star(col2,0.2)*bright;
143 |  //unit0.y = star(col2,0.3)*bright;
144 |  //unit0.z = star(col2,0.4)*bright;
145 |  //alpha = 1.0;
146 |
147 |  col2 = brickTile(col2,5.0);
148 |  unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(0.95))*bright;
149 |  unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(0.85))*bright;
150 |  unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(0.75))*bright;
151 |  }
152 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
153 |}
154 |

[Sun Apr 19 21:25:18 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(147) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected '=', expecting "::" at token "="

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform bool noiseIO;
 15 |
 16 |uniform float u_time;
 17 |
 18 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 19 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 20 |
 21 |out vec4 fragColor;
 22 |
 23 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 24 |{
 25 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 26 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 27 |
 28 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 29 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 30 |
 31 |  return pct0+pct1;
 32 |}
 33 |
 34 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 35 |{
 36 |    p*=z;
 37 |    return fract(p);
 38 |}
 39 |
 40 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 41 |    _st *= _zoom;
 42 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 43 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 44 |    }
 45 |    return fract(_st);
 46 |}
 47 |
 48 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 49 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 50 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 51 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
 52 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
 53 |}
 54 |
 55 |void main() { 
 56 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 57 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 58 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 59 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 60 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 61 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
 62 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
 63 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
 64 |
 65 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
 66 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
 67 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
 68 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
 69 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
 70 |
 71 |    alpha*=10;
 72 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
 73 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
 74 |
 75 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
 76 |
 77 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
 78 |    {
 79 |    discard;
 80 |    }
 81 |  switch(int(swapColor))
 82 |  {
 83 |  case 0:
 84 |    break;
 85 |  case 1:
 86 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
 87 |    break;
 88 |  case 2:
 89 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
 90 |    break;
 91 |  case 3:
 92 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
 93 |    break;
 94 |  case 4:
 95 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
 96 |    break;
 97 |  case 5:
 98 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
 99 |    break;
100 |  case 6:
101 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
102 |    break;
103 |  default:
104 |    break;
105 |  };
106 |
107 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
108 |  if (flag)
109 |  {
110 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
111 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
112 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
113 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
114 |  switch(line)
115 |  {
116 |  case 0:
117 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
118 |    break;
119 |  case 1:
120 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
121 |    break;
122 |  case 2:
123 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
124 |    break;
125 |  case 3:
126 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
127 |    break;
128 |  default:
129 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
130 |    break;
131 |  };
132 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
133 |  };
134 |
135 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
136 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
137 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
138 |  if (noiseIO)
139 |  {
140 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag
141 |  //col2 = tileF(col2, 10);
142 |  //unit0.x = star(col2,0.2)*bright;
143 |  //unit0.y = star(col2,0.3)*bright;
144 |  //unit0.z = star(col2,0.4)*bright;
145 |  //alpha = 1.0;
146 |
147 |  col2 = brickTile(texCoordFrag,5.0);
148 |  unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(0.95))*bright;
149 |  unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(0.85))*bright;
150 |  unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(0.75))*bright;
151 |  }
152 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
153 |}
154 |

[Sun Apr 19 23:20:07 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p5-2/textureReplace.vert
[Sun Apr 19 23:20:07 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
[Sun Apr 19 23:20:07 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(201) : error C1104: too many parameters in function call
0(201) : error C1104: too many parameters in function call
0(201) : error C1104: too many parameters in function call
0(201) : error C7011: implicit cast from "float" to "vec3"
0(202) : error C0000: syntax error, unexpected reserved word "break", expecting ',' or ';' at token "break"

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform int noiseIO;
 15 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 16 |uniform int tilePPF;
 17 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 18 |
 19 |uniform float u_time;
 20 |
 21 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 22 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 23 |
 24 |out vec4 fragColor;
 25 |
 26 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 27 |{
 28 |    p*=z;
 29 |    return fract(p);
 30 |}
 31 |
 32 |float noise (float timeX)
 33 |{
 34 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 35 |}
 36 |
 37 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 38 |{
 39 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 40 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 41 |
 42 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 43 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 44 |
 45 |  return pct0+pct1;
 46 |}
 47 |
 48 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 49 |    _st *= _zoom;
 50 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 51 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 52 |    }
 53 |    return fract(_st);
 54 |}
 55 |
 56 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 57 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 58 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 59 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
 60 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
 61 |}
 62 |
 63 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
 64 |  _st -= 0.5;
 65 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
 66 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
 67 |  _st += 0.5;
 68 |  return _st;
 69 |}
 70 |
 71 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
 72 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 73 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
 74 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
 75 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
 76 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
 77 |}
 78 |
 79 |vec2 offset(vec2 _st, vec2 _offset){
 80 |  vec2 uv;
 81 |  if(_st.x>0.5){
 82 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
 83 |  } else {
 84 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
 85 |  } 
 86 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
 87 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
 88 |  }else {
 89 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
 90 |  } 
 91 |  return uv;
 92 |}
 93 |
 94 |void main() { 
 95 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 96 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 97 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 98 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 99 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
100 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
101 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
102 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
103 |
104 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
105 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
106 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
107 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
108 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
109 |
110 |    alpha*=10;
111 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
112 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
113 |
114 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
115 |
116 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
117 |    {
118 |    discard;
119 |    }
120 |  switch(int(swapColor))
121 |  {
122 |  case 0:
123 |    break;
124 |  case 1:
125 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
126 |    break;
127 |  case 2:
128 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
129 |    break;
130 |  case 3:
131 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
132 |    break;
133 |  case 4:
134 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
135 |    break;
136 |  case 5:
137 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
138 |    break;
139 |  case 6:
140 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
141 |    break;
142 |  default:
143 |    break;
144 |  };
145 |
146 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
147 |  if (flag)
148 |  {
149 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
150 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
151 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
152 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
153 |  switch(line)
154 |  {
155 |  case 0:
156 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
157 |    break;
158 |  case 1:
159 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
160 |    break;
161 |  case 2:
162 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
163 |    break;
164 |  case 3:
165 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
166 |    break;
167 |  default:
168 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
169 |    break;
170 |  };
171 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
172 |  };
173 |
174 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
175 |  switch (noiseIO)
176 |  {
177 |  case 0:
178 |    break;
179 |  case 1:
180 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
181 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
182 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
183 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
184 |    break;
185 |  case 2:
186 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
187 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
188 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
189 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
190 |    break;
191 |  case 3:
192 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
193 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
194 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
195 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
196 |    break;
197 |  case 4:
198 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
199 |    vec2 offsetSt = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
200 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
201 |    unit0.xyz = box(offsetSt,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box(st,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box(st,vec2(zPPF),0.01)
202 |    break;
203 |  default:
204 |    break;
205 |  }
206 |
207 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
208 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
209 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
210 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
211 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
212 |}
213 |

 83 |  } else {
 84 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
 85 |  } 
 86 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
 87 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
 88 |  }else {
 89 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
 90 |  } 
 91 |  return uv;
 92 |}

 94 |void main() { 
 95 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 96 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 97 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 98 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 99 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
100 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
101 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
102 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
103 |

105 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
106 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
107 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
108 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
109 |
110 |    alpha*=10;
111 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
112 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
113 |
114 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
115 |
116 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
117 |    {
118 |    discard;
119 |    }
120 |  switch(int(swapColor))
121 |  {
122 |  case 0:
123 |    break;
124 |  case 1:
125 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
126 |    break;
127 |  case 2:
128 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
129 |    break;
130 |  case 3:
131 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
132 |    break;
133 |  case 4:
134 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
135 |    break;
136 |  case 5:
137 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
138 |    break;
139 |  case 6:
140 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
141 |    break;
142 |  default:
143 |    break;
144 |  };

146 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);

153 |  switch(line)
154 |  {

157 |    break;

160 |    break;

163 |    break;
164 |  case 3:
165 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
166 |    break;
167 |  default:
168 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
169 |    break;
170 |  };
171 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
172 |  };
173 |
174 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
175 |  switch (noiseIO)
176 |  {
177 |  case 0:
178 |    break;
179 |  case 1:
180 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
181 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
182 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
183 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
184 |    break;
185 |  case 2:
186 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
187 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
188 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
189 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
190 |    break;
191 |  case 3:
192 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
193 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
194 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
195 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
196 |    break;
197 |  case 4:
198 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
199 |    vec2 offsetSt = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
200 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
201 |    unit0.xyz = box(offsetSt,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box(st,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box(st,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
202 |    break;
203 |  default:
204 |    break;
205 |  }
206 |
207 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
208 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
209 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
210 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
211 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
212 |}
213 |

[Sun Apr 19 23:21:59 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(201) : error C1104: too many parameters in function call

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform int noiseIO;
 15 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 16 |uniform int tilePPF;
 17 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 18 |
 19 |uniform float u_time;
 20 |
 21 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 22 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 23 |
 24 |out vec4 fragColor;
 25 |
 26 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 27 |{
 28 |    p*=z;
 29 |    return fract(p);
 30 |}
 31 |
 32 |float noise (float timeX)
 33 |{
 34 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 35 |}
 36 |
 37 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 38 |{
 39 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 40 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 41 |
 42 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 43 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 44 |
 45 |  return pct0+pct1;
 46 |}
 47 |
 48 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 49 |    _st *= _zoom;
 50 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 51 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 52 |    }
 53 |    return fract(_st);
 54 |}
 55 |
 56 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 57 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 58 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 59 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
 60 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
 61 |}
 62 |
 63 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
 64 |  _st -= 0.5;
 65 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
 66 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
 67 |  _st += 0.5;
 68 |  return _st;
 69 |}
 70 |
 71 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
 72 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 73 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
 74 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
 75 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
 76 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
 77 |}
 78 |
 79 |vec2 offset(vec2 _st, vec2 _offset){
 80 |  vec2 uv;
 81 |  if(_st.x>0.5){
 82 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
 83 |  } else {
 84 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
 85 |  } 
 86 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
 87 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
 88 |  }else {
 89 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
 90 |  } 
 91 |  return uv;
 92 |}
 93 |
 94 |void main() { 
 95 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 96 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
 97 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
 98 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
 99 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
100 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
101 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
102 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
103 |
104 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
105 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
106 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
107 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
108 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
109 |
110 |    alpha*=10;
111 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
112 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
113 |
114 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
115 |
116 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
117 |    {
118 |    discard;
119 |    }
120 |  switch(int(swapColor))
121 |  {
122 |  case 0:
123 |    break;
124 |  case 1:
125 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
126 |    break;
127 |  case 2:
128 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
129 |    break;
130 |  case 3:
131 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
132 |    break;
133 |  case 4:
134 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
135 |    break;
136 |  case 5:
137 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
138 |    break;
139 |  case 6:
140 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
141 |    break;
142 |  default:
143 |    break;
144 |  };
145 |
146 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
147 |  if (flag)
148 |  {
149 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
150 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
151 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
152 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
153 |  switch(line)
154 |  {
155 |  case 0:
156 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
157 |    break;
158 |  case 1:
159 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
160 |    break;
161 |  case 2:
162 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
163 |    break;
164 |  case 3:
165 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
166 |    break;
167 |  default:
168 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
169 |    break;
170 |  };
171 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
172 |  };
173 |
174 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
175 |  switch (noiseIO)
176 |  {
177 |  case 0:
178 |    break;
179 |  case 1:
180 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
181 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
182 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
183 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
184 |    break;
185 |  case 2:
186 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
187 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
188 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
189 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
190 |    break;
191 |  case 3:
192 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
193 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
194 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
195 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
196 |    break;
197 |  case 4:
198 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
199 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
200 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
201 |    unit0 = vec4(box(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01),alpha);
202 |    break;
203 |  default:
204 |    break;
205 |  }
206 |
207 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
208 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
209 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
210 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
211 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
212 |}
213 |
