[Sun Apr 19 23:30:27 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(213) : error C1103: too few parameters in function call
0(214) : error C1103: too few parameters in function call
0(215) : error C1103: too few parameters in function call

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform int noiseIO;
 15 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 16 |uniform int tilePPF;
 17 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 18 |
 19 |uniform float u_time;
 20 |
 21 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 22 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 23 |
 24 |out vec4 fragColor;
 25 |
 26 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 27 |{
 28 |    p*=z;
 29 |    return fract(p);
 30 |}
 31 |
 32 |float noise (float timeX)
 33 |{
 34 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 35 |}
 36 |
 37 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 38 |{
 39 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 40 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 41 |
 42 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 43 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 44 |
 45 |  return pct0+pct1;
 46 |}
 47 |
 48 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 49 |    _st *= _zoom;
 50 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 51 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 52 |    }
 53 |    return fract(_st);
 54 |}
 55 |
 56 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 57 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 58 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 59 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
 60 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
 61 |}
 62 |
 63 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
 64 |  _st -= 0.5;
 65 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
 66 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
 67 |  _st += 0.5;
 68 |  return _st;
 69 |}
 70 |
 71 |float circle(vec2 _st, float _radius){
 72 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 73 |  return smoothstep(1.0-_radius,1.0-_radius+_radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
 74 |}
 75 |
 76 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
 77 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 78 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
 79 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
 80 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
 81 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
 82 |}
 83 |
 84 |vec2 offset(vec2 _st, vec2 _offset){
 85 |  vec2 uv;
 86 |  if(_st.x>0.5){
 87 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
 88 |  } else {
 89 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
 90 |  } 
 91 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
 92 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
 93 |  }else {
 94 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
 95 |  } 
 96 |  return uv;
 97 |}
 98 |
 99 |void main() { 
100 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
101 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
102 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
103 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
104 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
105 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
106 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
107 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
108 |
109 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
110 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
111 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
112 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
113 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
114 |
115 |    alpha*=10;
116 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
117 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
118 |
119 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
120 |
121 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
122 |    {
123 |    discard;
124 |    }
125 |  switch(int(swapColor))
126 |  {
127 |  case 0:
128 |    break;
129 |  case 1:
130 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
131 |    break;
132 |  case 2:
133 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
134 |    break;
135 |  case 3:
136 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
137 |    break;
138 |  case 4:
139 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
140 |    break;
141 |  case 5:
142 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
143 |    break;
144 |  case 6:
145 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
146 |    break;
147 |  default:
148 |    break;
149 |  };
150 |
151 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
152 |  if (flag)
153 |  {
154 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
155 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
156 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
157 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
158 |  switch(line)
159 |  {
160 |  case 0:
161 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
162 |    break;
163 |  case 1:
164 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
165 |    break;
166 |  case 2:
167 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
168 |    break;
169 |  case 3:
170 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
171 |    break;
172 |  default:
173 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
174 |    break;
175 |  };
176 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
177 |  };
178 |
179 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
180 |  switch (noiseIO)
181 |  {
182 |  case 0:
183 |    break;
184 |  case 1:
185 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
186 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
187 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
188 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
189 |    break;
190 |  case 2:
191 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
192 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
193 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
194 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
195 |    break;
196 |  case 3:
197 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
198 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
199 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
200 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
201 |    break;
202 |  case 4:
203 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
204 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
205 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
206 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
207 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
208 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
209 |    break;
210 |  case 5:
211 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
212 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
213 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF));
214 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF));
215 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF));
216 |    break;
217 |  default:
218 |    break;
219 |  }
220 |
221 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
222 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
223 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
224 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
225 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
226 |}
227 |

[Sun Apr 19 23:53:53 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
[Sun Apr 19 23:53:53 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(19) : error C1038: declaration of "timeV" conflicts with previous declaration at 0(13)

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform int noiseIO;
 15 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 16 |uniform int tilePPF;
 17 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 18 |
 19 |uniform float timeV;
 20 |
 21 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 22 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 23 |
 24 |out vec4 fragColor;
 25 |
 26 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 27 |{
 28 |    p*=z;
 29 |    return fract(p);
 30 |}
 31 |
 32 |float noise (float timeX)
 33 |{
 34 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 35 |}
 36 |
 37 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 38 |{
 39 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 40 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 41 |
 42 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 43 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 44 |
 45 |  return pct0+pct1;
 46 |}
 47 |
 48 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 49 |    _st *= _zoom;
 50 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 51 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 52 |    }
 53 |    return fract(_st);
 54 |}
 55 |
 56 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 57 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 58 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 59 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
 60 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
 61 |}
 62 |
 63 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
 64 |  _st -= 0.5;
 65 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
 66 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
 67 |  _st += 0.5;
 68 |  return _st;
 69 |}
 70 |
 71 |float circle(vec2 _st, float _radius){
 72 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 73 |  return smoothstep(1.0-_radius,1.0-_radius+_radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
 74 |}
 75 |
 76 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
 77 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 78 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
 79 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
 80 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
 81 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
 82 |}
 83 |
 84 |vec2 offset(vec2 _st, vec2 _offset){
 85 |  vec2 uv;
 86 |  if(_st.x>0.5){
 87 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
 88 |  } else {
 89 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
 90 |  } 
 91 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
 92 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
 93 |  }else {
 94 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
 95 |  } 
 96 |  return uv;
 97 |}
 98 |
 99 |void main() { 
100 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
101 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
102 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
103 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
104 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
105 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
106 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
107 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
108 |
109 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
110 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
111 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
112 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
113 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
114 |
115 |    alpha*=10;
116 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
117 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
118 |
119 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
120 |
121 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
122 |    {
123 |    discard;
124 |    }
125 |  switch(int(swapColor))
126 |  {
127 |  case 0:
128 |    break;
129 |  case 1:
130 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
131 |    break;
132 |  case 2:
133 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
134 |    break;
135 |  case 3:
136 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
137 |    break;
138 |  case 4:
139 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
140 |    break;
141 |  case 5:
142 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
143 |    break;
144 |  case 6:
145 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
146 |    break;
147 |  default:
148 |    break;
149 |  };
150 |
151 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
152 |  if (flag)
153 |  {
154 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
155 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
156 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
157 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
158 |  switch(line)
159 |  {
160 |  case 0:
161 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
162 |    break;
163 |  case 1:
164 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
165 |    break;
166 |  case 2:
167 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
168 |    break;
169 |  case 3:
170 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
171 |    break;
172 |  default:
173 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
174 |    break;
175 |  };
176 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
177 |  };
178 |
179 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
180 |  switch (noiseIO)
181 |  {
182 |  case 0:
183 |    break;
184 |  case 1:
185 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
186 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
187 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
188 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
189 |    break;
190 |  case 2:
191 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
192 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
193 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
194 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
195 |    break;
196 |  case 3:
197 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
198 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
199 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
200 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
201 |    break;
202 |  case 4:
203 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
204 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
205 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
206 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
207 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
208 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
209 |    break;
210 |  case 5:
211 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
212 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
213 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF),0.01);
214 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01);
215 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
216 |    break;
217 |  case 6:
218 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
219 |    float angle = 3.14*0.25*cos(timeV*0.5);
220 |    float rows = 10;
221 |    if (fract(texCoordFrag.y * 0.5 * rows) > 0.5)
222 |    {
223 |      angle *= -1.0;
224 |    }
225 |    col2 = rotate2D(st,angle);
226 |    col2 *= 2.0;
227 |    float pct = (1.0+cos(3.14*col2.x))*0.5;
228 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
229 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
230 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
231 |    break;
232 |  default:
233 |    break;
234 |  }
235 |
236 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
237 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
238 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
239 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
240 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
241 |}
242 |

[Sun Apr 19 23:54:22 2020] INF: [shader.cpp (169)] Compilando ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
[Sun Apr 19 23:54:22 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(223) : error C1008: undefined variable "st"

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform int noiseIO;
 15 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 16 |uniform int tilePPF;
 17 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 18 |
 19 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 20 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 21 |
 22 |out vec4 fragColor;
 23 |
 24 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 25 |{
 26 |    p*=z;
 27 |    return fract(p);
 28 |}
 29 |
 30 |float noise (float timeX)
 31 |{
 32 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 33 |}
 34 |
 35 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 36 |{
 37 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 38 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 39 |
 40 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 41 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 42 |
 43 |  return pct0+pct1;
 44 |}
 45 |
 46 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 47 |    _st *= _zoom;
 48 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 49 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 50 |    }
 51 |    return fract(_st);
 52 |}
 53 |
 54 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 55 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 56 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 57 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
 58 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
 59 |}
 60 |
 61 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
 62 |  _st -= 0.5;
 63 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
 64 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
 65 |  _st += 0.5;
 66 |  return _st;
 67 |}
 68 |
 69 |float circle(vec2 _st, float _radius){
 70 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 71 |  return smoothstep(1.0-_radius,1.0-_radius+_radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
 72 |}
 73 |
 74 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
 75 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 76 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
 77 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
 78 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
 79 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
 80 |}
 81 |
 82 |vec2 offset(vec2 _st, vec2 _offset){
 83 |  vec2 uv;
 84 |  if(_st.x>0.5){
 85 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
 86 |  } else {
 87 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
 88 |  } 
 89 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
 90 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
 91 |  }else {
 92 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
 93 |  } 
 94 |  return uv;
 95 |}
 96 |
 97 |void main() { 
 98 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
 99 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
100 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
101 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
102 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
103 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
104 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
105 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
106 |
107 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
108 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
109 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
110 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
111 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
112 |
113 |    alpha*=10;
114 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
115 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
116 |
117 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
118 |
119 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
120 |    {
121 |    discard;
122 |    }
123 |  switch(int(swapColor))
124 |  {
125 |  case 0:
126 |    break;
127 |  case 1:
128 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
129 |    break;
130 |  case 2:
131 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
132 |    break;
133 |  case 3:
134 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
135 |    break;
136 |  case 4:
137 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
138 |    break;
139 |  case 5:
140 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
141 |    break;
142 |  case 6:
143 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
144 |    break;
145 |  default:
146 |    break;
147 |  };
148 |
149 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
150 |  if (flag)
151 |  {
152 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
153 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
154 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
155 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
156 |  switch(line)
157 |  {
158 |  case 0:
159 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
160 |    break;
161 |  case 1:
162 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
163 |    break;
164 |  case 2:
165 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
166 |    break;
167 |  case 3:
168 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
169 |    break;
170 |  default:
171 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
172 |    break;
173 |  };
174 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
175 |  };
176 |
177 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
178 |  switch (noiseIO)
179 |  {
180 |  case 0:
181 |    break;
182 |  case 1:
183 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
184 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
185 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
186 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
187 |    break;
188 |  case 2:
189 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
190 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
191 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
192 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
193 |    break;
194 |  case 3:
195 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
196 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
197 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
198 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
199 |    break;
200 |  case 4:
201 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
202 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
203 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
204 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
205 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
206 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
207 |    break;
208 |  case 5:
209 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
210 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
211 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF),0.01);
212 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01);
213 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
214 |    break;
215 |  case 6:
216 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
217 |    float angle = 3.14*0.25*cos(timeV*0.5);
218 |    float rows = 10;
219 |    if (fract(texCoordFrag.y * 0.5 * rows) > 0.5)
220 |    {
221 |      angle *= -1.0;
222 |    }
223 |    col2 = rotate2D(st,angle);
224 |    col2 *= 2.0;
225 |    float pct = (1.0+cos(3.14*col2.x))*0.5;
226 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
227 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
228 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
229 |    break;
230 |  default:
231 |    break;
232 |  }
233 |
234 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
235 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
236 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
237 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
238 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
239 |}
240 |

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform int noiseIO;
 15 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 16 |uniform int tilePPF;
 17 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 18 |
 19 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 20 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 21 |
 22 |out vec4 fragColor;
 23 |
 24 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 25 |{
 26 |    p*=z;
 27 |    return fract(p);
 28 |}
 29 |
 30 |vec2 radialTile(vec2 _st, vec2 _vel, float _zoom){
 31 |  vec2 toExtreme = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 32 |  vec2 polar = vec2( (PI+atan(toExtreme.y,toExtreme.x))/TWO_PI,   // Angle
 33 |                      log(length(toExtreme))*PHI*0.1);            // Radius
 34 |  polar *= _zoom;
 35 |
 36 |  polar.y += _vel.y;
 37 |  if (fract( polar.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 38 |    polar.x += _vel.x;
 39 |  } else {
 40 |    polar.x -= _vel.x;
 41 |  }
 42 |
 43 |  return fract(polar);
 44 |}
 45 |
 46 |float noise (float timeX)
 47 |{
 48 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 49 |}
 50 |
 51 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 52 |{
 53 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 54 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 55 |
 56 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 57 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 58 |
 59 |  return pct0+pct1;
 60 |}
 61 |
 62 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 63 |    _st *= _zoom;
 64 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 65 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 66 |    }
 67 |    return fract(_st);
 68 |}
 69 |
 70 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 71 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 72 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 73 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
 74 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
 75 |}
 76 |
 77 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
 78 |  _st -= 0.5;
 79 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
 80 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
 81 |  _st += 0.5;
 82 |  return _st;
 83 |}
 84 |
 85 |float circle(vec2 _st, float _radius){
 86 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 87 |  return smoothstep(1.0-_radius,1.0-_radius+_radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
 88 |}
 89 |
 90 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
 91 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 92 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
 93 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
 94 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
 95 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
 96 |}
 97 |
 98 |vec2 offset(vec2 _st, vec2 _offset){
 99 |  vec2 uv;
100 |  if(_st.x>0.5){
101 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
102 |  } else {
103 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
104 |  } 
105 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
106 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
107 |  }else {
108 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
109 |  } 
110 |  return uv;
111 |}
112 |
113 |vec2 movingTiles(vec2 _st, float _zoom, float _speed){
114 |  _st *= _zoom;
115 |  float time = u_time*_speed;
116 |  if( fract(time)>0.5 ){
117 |    if (fract( _st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
118 |      _st.x += fract(time)*2.0;
119 |    } else {
120 |      _st.x -= fract(time)*2.0;
121 |    } 
122 |  } else {
123 |    if (fract( _st.x * 0.5) > 0.5){
124 |      _st.y += fract(time)*2.0;
125 |    } else {
126 |        _st.y -= fract(time)*2.0;
127 |    } 
128 |  }
129 |  return fract(_st);
130 |}
131 |
132 |void main() { 
133 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
134 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
135 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
136 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
137 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
138 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
139 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
140 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
141 |
142 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
143 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
144 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
145 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
146 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
147 |
148 |    alpha*=10;
149 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
150 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
151 |
152 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
153 |
154 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
155 |    {
156 |    discard;
157 |    }
158 |  switch(int(swapColor))
159 |  {
160 |  case 0:
161 |    break;
162 |  case 1:
163 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
164 |    break;
165 |  case 2:
166 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
167 |    break;
168 |  case 3:
169 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
170 |    break;
171 |  case 4:
172 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
173 |    break;
174 |  case 5:
175 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
176 |    break;
177 |  case 6:
178 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
179 |    break;
180 |  default:
181 |    break;
182 |  };
183 |
184 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
185 |  if (flag)
186 |  {
187 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
188 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
189 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
190 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
191 |  switch(line)
192 |  {
193 |  case 0:
194 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
195 |    break;
196 |  case 1:
197 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
198 |    break;
199 |  case 2:
200 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
201 |    break;
202 |  case 3:
203 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
204 |    break;
205 |  default:
206 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
207 |    break;
208 |  };
209 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
210 |  };
211 |
212 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
213 |  switch (noiseIO)
214 |  {
215 |  case 0:
216 |    break;
217 |  case 1:
218 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
219 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
220 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
221 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
222 |    break;
223 |  case 2:
224 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
225 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
226 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
227 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
228 |    break;
229 |  case 3:
230 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
231 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
232 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
233 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
234 |    break;
235 |  case 4:
236 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
237 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
238 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
239 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
240 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
241 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
242 |    break;
243 |  case 5:
244 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
245 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
246 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF),0.01);
247 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01);
248 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
249 |    break;
250 |  case 6:
251 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
252 |    float angle = 3.14*0.25*cos(timeV*0.5);
253 |    float rows = 10;
254 |    if (fract(texCoordFrag.y * 0.5 * rows) > 0.5)
255 |    {
256 |      angle *= -1.0;
257 |    }
258 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,angle);
259 |    col2 *= 2.0;
260 |    float pct = (1.0+cos(3.14*col2.x))*0.5;
261 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
262 |    unit0.y = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
263 |    unit0.z = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
264 |    break;
265 |  case 7:
266 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*fract(timeV*0.1));
267 |    //col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
268 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(fract(timeV*0.5)),tilePPF+5);
269 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(-fract(timeV),0.0),tilePPF+2);
270 |    unit0.x = box2(st,vec2(xPPF,1 - xPPF),0.01);
271 |    unit0.y = box2(st,vec2(yPPF,1 - yPPF),0.01);
272 |    unit0.z = box2(st,vec2(zPPF,1 - zPPF),0.01);
273 |    break;
274 |  case 8:
275 |    unit0.x = noise(timeV);
276 |    unit0.y = noise(timeV);
277 |    unit0.z = noise(timeV);
278 |    break;
279 |  default:
280 |    break;
281 |  }
282 |
283 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
284 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
285 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
286 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
287 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
288 |}
289 |

  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform int noiseIO;
 15 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 16 |uniform int tilePPF;
 17 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 18 |
 19 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 20 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 21 |
 22 |out vec4 fragColor;
 23 |
 24 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 25 |{
 26 |    p*=z;
 27 |    return fract(p);
 28 |}
 29 |
 30 |vec2 radialTile(vec2 _st, vec2 _vel, float _zoom){
 31 |  vec2 toExtreme = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 32 |  vec2 polar = vec2( (3.14+atan(toExtreme.y,toExtreme.x))/(2*3.14),   // Angle
 33 |                      log(length(toExtreme))*PHI*0.1);            // Radius
 34 |  polar *= _zoom;
 35 |
 36 |  polar.y += _vel.y;
 37 |  if (fract( polar.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 38 |    polar.x += _vel.x;
 39 |  } else {
 40 |    polar.x -= _vel.x;
 41 |  }
 42 |
 43 |  return fract(polar);
 44 |}
 45 |
 46 |float noise (float timeX)
 47 |{
 48 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 49 |}
 50 |
 51 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 52 |{
 53 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 54 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 55 |
 56 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 57 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 58 |
 59 |  return pct0+pct1;
 60 |}

 64 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 65 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 66 |    }
 67 |    return fract(_st);
 68 |}

 70 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){

 72 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 73 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
 74 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
 75 |}
 76 |
 77 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
 78 |  _st -= 0.5;
 79 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
 80 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
 81 |  _st += 0.5;
 82 |  return _st;
 83 |}

 86 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 87 |  return smoothstep(1.0-_radius,1.0-_radius+_radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
 88 |}

 90 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
 91 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 92 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
 93 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
 94 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
 95 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
 96 |}

101 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
102 |  } else {
103 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
104 |  }

107 |  }else {
108 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
109 |  } 
110 |  return uv;

113 |vec2 movingTiles(vec2 _st, float _zoom, float _speed){
114 |  _st *= _zoom;
115 |  float time = u_time*_speed;
116 |  if( fract(time)>0.5 ){
117 |    if (fract( _st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
118 |      _st.x += fract(time)*2.0;
119 |    } else {
120 |      _st.x -= fract(time)*2.0;
121 |    } 
122 |  } else {
123 |    if (fract( _st.x * 0.5) > 0.5){
124 |      _st.y += fract(time)*2.0;
125 |    } else {
126 |        _st.y -= fract(time)*2.0;
127 |    } 
128 |  }
129 |  return fract(_st);
130 |}

132 |void main() { 
133 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
134 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
135 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
136 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
137 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
138 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
139 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
140 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
141 |
142 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
143 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
144 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
145 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
146 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
147 |
148 |    alpha*=10;
149 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
150 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
151 |
152 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
153 |
154 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
155 |    {
156 |    discard;
157 |    }
158 |  switch(int(swapColor))
159 |  {
160 |  case 0:
161 |    break;
162 |  case 1:
163 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
164 |    break;
165 |  case 2:
166 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
167 |    break;
168 |  case 3:
169 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
170 |    break;
171 |  case 4:
172 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
173 |    break;
174 |  case 5:
175 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
176 |    break;
177 |  case 6:
178 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
179 |    break;
180 |  default:
181 |    break;
182 |  };
183 |
184 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
185 |  if (flag)
186 |  {
187 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
188 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
189 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
190 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
191 |  switch(line)
192 |  {
193 |  case 0:
194 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
195 |    break;
196 |  case 1:
197 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
198 |    break;
199 |  case 2:
200 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
201 |    break;
202 |  case 3:
203 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
204 |    break;
205 |  default:
206 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
207 |    break;
208 |  };
209 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
210 |  };
211 |
212 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
213 |  switch (noiseIO)
214 |  {
215 |  case 0:
216 |    break;
217 |  case 1:
218 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
219 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
220 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
221 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
222 |    break;
223 |  case 2:
224 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
225 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
226 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
227 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
228 |    break;
229 |  case 3:
230 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
231 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
232 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
233 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
234 |    break;
235 |  case 4:
236 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
237 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
238 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
239 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
240 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
241 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
242 |    break;
243 |  case 5:
244 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
245 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
246 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF),0.01);
247 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01);
248 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
249 |    break;
250 |  case 6:
251 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
252 |    float angle = 3.14*0.25*cos(timeV*0.5);
253 |    float rows = 10;
254 |    if (fract(texCoordFrag.y * 0.5 * rows) > 0.5)
255 |    {
256 |      angle *= -1.0;
257 |    }
258 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,angle);
259 |    col2 *= 2.0;
260 |    float pct = (1.0+cos(3.14*col2.x))*0.5;
261 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
262 |    unit0.y = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
263 |    unit0.z = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
264 |    break;
265 |  case 7:
266 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*fract(timeV*0.1));
267 |    //col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
268 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(fract(timeV*0.5)),tilePPF+5);
269 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(-fract(timeV),0.0),tilePPF+2);
270 |    unit0.x = box2(st,vec2(xPPF,1 - xPPF),0.01);
271 |    unit0.y = box2(st,vec2(yPPF,1 - yPPF),0.01);
272 |    unit0.z = box2(st,vec2(zPPF,1 - zPPF),0.01);
273 |    break;
274 |  case 8:
275 |    unit0.x = noise(timeV);
276 |    unit0.y = noise(timeV);
277 |    unit0.z = noise(timeV);
278 |    break;
279 |  default:
280 |    break;
281 |  }
282 |
283 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
284 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
285 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
286 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
287 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
288 |}
289 |

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform int noiseIO;
 15 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 16 |uniform int tilePPF;
 17 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 18 |
 19 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 20 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 21 |
 22 |out vec4 fragColor;
 23 |
 24 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 25 |{
 26 |    p*=z;
 27 |    return fract(p);
 28 |}
 29 |
 30 |vec2 radialTile(vec2 _st, vec2 _vel, float _zoom){
 31 |  vec2 toExtreme = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 32 |  vec2 polar = vec2( (3.14+atan(toExtreme.y,toExtreme.x))/(2*3.14),   // Angle
 33 |                      log(length(toExtreme))*1.62*0.1);            // Radius
 34 |  polar *= _zoom;
 35 |
 36 |  polar.y += _vel.y;
 37 |  if (fract( polar.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 38 |    polar.x += _vel.x;
 39 |  } else {
 40 |    polar.x -= _vel.x;
 41 |  }
 42 |
 43 |  return fract(polar);
 44 |}
 45 |
 46 |float noise (float timeX)
 47 |{
 48 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 49 |}
 50 |
 51 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 52 |{
 53 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 54 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 55 |
 56 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 57 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 58 |
 59 |  return pct0+pct1;
 60 |}
 61 |
 62 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 63 |    _st *= _zoom;
 64 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 65 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 66 |    }
 67 |    return fract(_st);
 68 |}
 69 |
 70 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 71 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 72 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 73 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
 74 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
 75 |}
 76 |
 77 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
 78 |  _st -= 0.5;
 79 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
 80 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
 81 |  _st += 0.5;
 82 |  return _st;
 83 |}
 84 |
 85 |float circle(vec2 _st, float _radius){
 86 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 87 |  return smoothstep(1.0-_radius,1.0-_radius+_radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
 88 |}
 89 |
 90 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
 91 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 92 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
 93 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
 94 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
 95 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
 96 |}
 97 |
 98 |vec2 offset(vec2 _st, vec2 _offset){
 99 |  vec2 uv;
100 |  if(_st.x>0.5){
101 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
102 |  } else {
103 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
104 |  } 
105 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
106 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
107 |  }else {
108 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
109 |  } 
110 |  return uv;
111 |}
112 |
113 |vec2 movingTiles(vec2 _st, float _zoom, float _speed){
114 |  _st *= _zoom;
115 |  float time = u_time*_speed;
116 |  if( fract(time)>0.5 ){
117 |    if (fract( _st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
118 |      _st.x += fract(time)*2.0;
119 |    } else {
120 |      _st.x -= fract(time)*2.0;
121 |    } 
122 |  } else {
123 |    if (fract( _st.x * 0.5) > 0.5){
124 |      _st.y += fract(time)*2.0;
125 |    } else {
126 |        _st.y -= fract(time)*2.0;
127 |    } 
128 |  }
129 |  return fract(_st);
130 |}
131 |
132 |void main() { 
133 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
134 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
135 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
136 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
137 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
138 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
139 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
140 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
141 |
142 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
143 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
144 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
145 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
146 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
147 |
148 |    alpha*=10;
149 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
150 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
151 |
152 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
153 |
154 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
155 |    {
156 |    discard;
157 |    }
158 |  switch(int(swapColor))
159 |  {
160 |  case 0:
161 |    break;
162 |  case 1:
163 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
164 |    break;
165 |  case 2:
166 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
167 |    break;
168 |  case 3:
169 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
170 |    break;
171 |  case 4:
172 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
173 |    break;
174 |  case 5:
175 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
176 |    break;
177 |  case 6:
178 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
179 |    break;
180 |  default:
181 |    break;
182 |  };
183 |
184 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
185 |  if (flag)
186 |  {
187 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
188 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
189 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
190 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
191 |  switch(line)
192 |  {
193 |  case 0:
194 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
195 |    break;
196 |  case 1:
197 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
198 |    break;
199 |  case 2:
200 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
201 |    break;
202 |  case 3:
203 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
204 |    break;
205 |  default:
206 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
207 |    break;
208 |  };
209 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
210 |  };
211 |
212 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
213 |  switch (noiseIO)
214 |  {
215 |  case 0:
216 |    break;
217 |  case 1:
218 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
219 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
220 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
221 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
222 |    break;
223 |  case 2:
224 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
225 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
226 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
227 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
228 |    break;
229 |  case 3:
230 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
231 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
232 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
233 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
234 |    break;
235 |  case 4:
236 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
237 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
238 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
239 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
240 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
241 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
242 |    break;
243 |  case 5:
244 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
245 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
246 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF),0.01);
247 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01);
248 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
249 |    break;
250 |  case 6:
251 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
252 |    float angle = 3.14*0.25*cos(timeV*0.5);
253 |    float rows = 10;
254 |    if (fract(texCoordFrag.y * 0.5 * rows) > 0.5)
255 |    {
256 |      angle *= -1.0;
257 |    }
258 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,angle);
259 |    col2 *= 2.0;
260 |    float pct = (1.0+cos(3.14*col2.x))*0.5;
261 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
262 |    unit0.y = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
263 |    unit0.z = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
264 |    break;
265 |  case 7:
266 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*fract(timeV*0.1));
267 |    //col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
268 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(fract(timeV*0.5)),tilePPF+5);
269 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(-fract(timeV),0.0),tilePPF+2);
270 |    unit0.x = box2(st,vec2(xPPF,1 - xPPF),0.01);
271 |    unit0.y = box2(st,vec2(yPPF,1 - yPPF),0.01);
272 |    unit0.z = box2(st,vec2(zPPF,1 - zPPF),0.01);
273 |    break;
274 |  case 8:
275 |    unit0.x = noise(timeV);
276 |    unit0.y = noise(timeV);
277 |    unit0.z = noise(timeV);
278 |    break;
279 |  default:
280 |    break;
281 |  }
282 |
283 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
284 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
285 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
286 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
287 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
288 |}

 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform int noiseIO;
 15 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 16 |uniform int tilePPF;
 17 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 18 |
 19 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 20 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 21 |
 22 |out vec4 fragColor;
 23 |
 24 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 25 |{
 26 |    p*=z;
 27 |    return fract(p);
 28 |}
 29 |
 30 |vec2 radialTile(vec2 _st, vec2 _vel, float _zoom){
 31 |  vec2 toExtreme = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 32 |  vec2 polar = vec2( (3.14+atan(toExtreme.y,toExtreme.x))/(2*3.14),   // Angle
 33 |                      log(length(toExtreme))*1.62*0.1);            // Radius
 34 |  polar *= _zoom;
 35 |
 36 |  polar.y += _vel.y;
 37 |  if (fract( polar.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 38 |    polar.x += _vel.x;
 39 |  } else {
 40 |    polar.x -= _vel.x;
 41 |  }
 42 |
 43 |  return fract(polar);
 44 |}
 45 |
 46 |float noise (float timeX)
 47 |{
 48 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 49 |}
 50 |
 51 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 52 |{
 53 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 54 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 55 |
 56 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 57 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 58 |
 59 |  return pct0+pct1;
 60 |}
 61 |
 62 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 63 |    _st *= _zoom;
 64 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 65 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 66 |    }
 67 |    return fract(_st);
 68 |}
 69 |
 70 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 71 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 72 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 73 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
 74 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
 75 |}
 76 |
 77 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
 78 |  _st -= 0.5;
 79 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
 80 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
 81 |  _st += 0.5;
 82 |  return _st;
 83 |}
 84 |
 85 |float circle(vec2 _st, float _radius){
 86 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 87 |  return smoothstep(1.0-_radius,1.0-_radius+_radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
 88 |}
 89 |
 90 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
 91 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 92 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
 93 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
 94 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
 95 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
 96 |}
 97 |
 98 |vec2 offset(vec2 _st, vec2 _offset){
 99 |  vec2 uv;
100 |  if(_st.x>0.5){
101 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
102 |  } else {
103 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
104 |  } 
105 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
106 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
107 |  }else {
108 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
109 |  } 
110 |  return uv;
111 |}
112 |
113 |vec2 movingTiles(vec2 _st, float _zoom, float _speed){
114 |  _st *= _zoom;
115 |  float time = timeV*_speed;
116 |  if( fract(time)>0.5 ){
117 |    if (fract( _st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
118 |      _st.x += fract(time)*2.0;
119 |    } else {
120 |      _st.x -= fract(time)*2.0;
121 |    } 
122 |  } else {
123 |    if (fract( _st.x * 0.5) > 0.5){
124 |      _st.y += fract(time)*2.0;
125 |    } else {
126 |        _st.y -= fract(time)*2.0;
127 |    } 
128 |  }
129 |  return fract(_st);
130 |}
131 |
132 |void main() { 
133 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
134 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
135 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
136 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
137 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
138 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
139 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
140 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
141 |
142 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
143 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
144 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
145 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
146 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
147 |
148 |    alpha*=10;
149 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
150 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
151 |
152 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
153 |
154 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
155 |    {
156 |    discard;
157 |    }
158 |  switch(int(swapColor))
159 |  {
160 |  case 0:
161 |    break;
162 |  case 1:
163 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
164 |    break;
165 |  case 2:
166 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
167 |    break;
168 |  case 3:
169 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
170 |    break;
171 |  case 4:
172 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
173 |    break;
174 |  case 5:
175 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
176 |    break;
177 |  case 6:
178 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
179 |    break;
180 |  default:
181 |    break;
182 |  };
183 |
184 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
185 |  if (flag)
186 |  {
187 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
188 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
189 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
190 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
191 |  switch(line)
192 |  {
193 |  case 0:
194 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
195 |    break;
196 |  case 1:
197 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
198 |    break;
199 |  case 2:
200 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
201 |    break;
202 |  case 3:
203 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
204 |    break;
205 |  default:
206 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
207 |    break;
208 |  };
209 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
210 |  };
211 |
212 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
213 |  switch (noiseIO)
214 |  {
215 |  case 0:
216 |    break;
217 |  case 1:
218 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
219 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
220 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
221 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
222 |    break;
223 |  case 2:
224 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
225 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
226 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
227 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
228 |    break;
229 |  case 3:
230 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
231 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
232 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
233 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
234 |    break;
235 |  case 4:
236 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
237 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
238 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
239 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
240 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
241 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
242 |    break;
243 |  case 5:
244 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
245 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
246 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF),0.01);
247 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01);
248 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
249 |    break;
250 |  case 6:
251 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
252 |    float angle = 3.14*0.25*cos(timeV*0.5);
253 |    float rows = 10;
254 |    if (fract(texCoordFrag.y * 0.5 * rows) > 0.5)
255 |    {
256 |      angle *= -1.0;
257 |    }
258 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,angle);
259 |    col2 *= 2.0;
260 |    float pct = (1.0+cos(3.14*col2.x))*0.5;
261 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
262 |    unit0.y = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
263 |    unit0.z = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
264 |    break;
265 |  case 7:
266 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*fract(timeV*0.1));
267 |    //col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
268 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(fract(timeV*0.5)),tilePPF+5);
269 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(-fract(timeV),0.0),tilePPF+2);
270 |    unit0.x = box2(st,vec2(xPPF,1 - xPPF),0.01);
271 |    unit0.y = box2(st,vec2(yPPF,1 - yPPF),0.01);
272 |    unit0.z = box2(st,vec2(zPPF,1 - zPPF),0.01);
273 |    break;
274 |  case 8:
275 |    unit0.x = noise(timeV);
276 |    unit0.y = noise(timeV);
277 |    unit0.z = noise(timeV);
278 |    break;
279 |  default:
280 |    break;
281 |  }
282 |
283 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
284 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
285 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
286 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
287 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
288 |}
289 |

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform int noiseIO;
 15 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 16 |uniform int tilePPF;
 17 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 18 |
 19 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 20 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 21 |
 22 |out vec4 fragColor;
 23 |
 24 |float rand(float n){return fract(sin(n) * 43758.5453123);}
 25 |
 26 |float noise(float p){
 27 |	float fl = floor(p);
 28 |  float fc = fract(p);
 29 |	return mix(rand(fl), rand(fl + 1.0), fc);
 30 |}
 31 |	
 32 |float noise2(vec2 n) {
 33 |	const vec2 d = vec2(0.0, 1.0);
 34 |  vec2 b = floor(n), f = smoothstep(vec2(0.0), vec2(1.0), fract(n));
 35 |	return mix(mix(rand(b), rand(b + d.yx), f.x), mix(rand(b + d.xy), rand(b + d.yy), f.x), f.y);
 36 |}
 37 |
 38 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 39 |{
 40 |    p*=z;
 41 |    return fract(p);
 42 |}
 43 |
 44 |vec2 radialTile(vec2 _st, vec2 _vel, float _zoom){
 45 |  vec2 toExtreme = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 46 |  vec2 polar = vec2( (3.14+atan(toExtreme.y,toExtreme.x))/(2*3.14),   // Angle
 47 |                      log(length(toExtreme))*1.62*0.1);            // Radius
 48 |  polar *= _zoom;
 49 |
 50 |  polar.y += _vel.y;
 51 |  if (fract( polar.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 52 |    polar.x += _vel.x;
 53 |  } else {
 54 |    polar.x -= _vel.x;
 55 |  }
 56 |
 57 |  return fract(polar);
 58 |}
 59 |
 60 |float chaos (float timeX)
 61 |{
 62 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 63 |}
 64 |
 65 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 66 |{
 67 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 68 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 69 |
 70 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 71 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 72 |
 73 |  return pct0+pct1;
 74 |}
 75 |
 76 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 77 |    _st *= _zoom;
 78 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 79 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 80 |    }
 81 |    return fract(_st);
 82 |}
 83 |
 84 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 85 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 86 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 87 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
 88 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
 89 |}
 90 |
 91 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
 92 |  _st -= 0.5;
 93 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
 94 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
 95 |  _st += 0.5;
 96 |  return _st;
 97 |}
 98 |
 99 |float circle(vec2 _st, float _radius){
100 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-_st;
101 |  return smoothstep(1.0-_radius,1.0-_radius+_radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
102 |}
103 |
104 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
105 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
106 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
107 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
108 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
109 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
110 |}
111 |
112 |vec2 offset(vec2 _st, vec2 _offset){
113 |  vec2 uv;
114 |  if(_st.x>0.5){
115 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
116 |  } else {
117 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
118 |  } 
119 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
120 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
121 |  }else {
122 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
123 |  } 
124 |  return uv;
125 |}
126 |
127 |vec2 movingTiles(vec2 _st, float _zoom, float _speed){
128 |  _st *= _zoom;
129 |  float time = timeV*_speed;
130 |  if( fract(time)>0.5 ){
131 |    if (fract( _st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
132 |      _st.x += fract(time)*2.0;
133 |    } else {
134 |      _st.x -= fract(time)*2.0;
135 |    } 
136 |  } else {
137 |    if (fract( _st.x * 0.5) > 0.5){
138 |      _st.y += fract(time)*2.0;
139 |    } else {
140 |        _st.y -= fract(time)*2.0;
141 |    } 
142 |  }
143 |  return fract(_st);
144 |}
145 |
146 |void main() { 
147 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
148 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
149 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
150 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
151 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
152 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
153 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
154 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
155 |
156 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
157 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
158 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
159 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
160 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
161 |
162 |    alpha*=10;
163 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
164 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
165 |
166 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
167 |
168 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
169 |    {
170 |    discard;
171 |    }
172 |  switch(int(swapColor))
173 |  {
174 |  case 0:
175 |    break;
176 |  case 1:
177 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
178 |    break;
179 |  case 2:
180 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
181 |    break;
182 |  case 3:
183 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
184 |    break;
185 |  case 4:
186 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
187 |    break;
188 |  case 5:
189 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
190 |    break;
191 |  case 6:
192 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
193 |    break;
194 |  default:
195 |    break;
196 |  };
197 |
198 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
199 |  if (flag)
200 |  {
201 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
202 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
203 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
204 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
205 |  switch(line)
206 |  {
207 |  case 0:
208 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
209 |    break;
210 |  case 1:
211 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
212 |    break;
213 |  case 2:
214 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
215 |    break;
216 |  case 3:
217 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
218 |    break;
219 |  default:
220 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
221 |    break;
222 |  };
223 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
224 |  };
225 |
226 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
227 |  switch (noiseIO)
228 |  {
229 |  case 0:
230 |    break;
231 |  case 1:
232 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
233 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
234 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
235 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
236 |    break;
237 |  case 2:
238 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
239 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
240 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
241 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
242 |    break;
243 |  case 3:
244 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
245 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
246 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
247 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
248 |    break;
249 |  case 4:
250 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
251 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
252 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
253 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
254 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
255 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
256 |    break;
257 |  case 5:
258 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
259 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
260 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF),0.01);
261 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01);
262 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
263 |    break;
264 |  case 6:
265 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
266 |    float angle = 3.14*0.25*cos(timeV*0.5);
267 |    float rows = 10;
268 |    if (fract(texCoordFrag.y * 0.5 * rows) > 0.5)
269 |    {
270 |      angle *= -1.0;
271 |    }
272 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,angle);
273 |    col2 *= 2.0;
274 |    float pct = (1.0+cos(3.14*col2.x))*0.5;
275 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
276 |    unit0.y = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
277 |    unit0.z = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
278 |    break;
279 |  case 7:
280 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*fract(timeV*0.1));
281 |    //col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
282 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(fract(timeV*0.5)),tilePPF+5);
283 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(-fract(timeV),0.0),tilePPF+2);
284 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF,1 - xPPF),0.01);
285 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF,1 - yPPF),0.01);
286 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF,1 - zPPF),0.01);
287 |    break;
288 |  case 8:
289 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*chaos(timeV));
290 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*chaos(timeV));
291 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*chaos(timeV));
292 |    break;
293 |  case 9:
294 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*noise(timeV));
295 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*noise(timeV));
296 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*noise(timeV));
297 |    break;
298 |  case 10:
299 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*noise2(col2));
300 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*noise2(col2));
301 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*noise2(col2));
302 |    break;
303 |  default:
304 |    break;
305 |  }
306 |
307 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
308 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
309 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
310 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
311 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
312 |}
313 |

  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;

 12 |uniform float bright;

 14 |uniform int noiseIO;
 15 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 16 |uniform int tilePPF;
 17 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 18 |
 19 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 20 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 21 |
 22 |out vec4 fragColor;
 23 |
 24 |float rand(float n){return fract(sin(n) * 43758.5453123);}
 25 |
 26 |float noise(float p){
 27 |	float fl = floor(p);
 28 |  float fc = fract(p);
 29 |	return mix(rand(fl), rand(fl + 1.0), fc);
 30 |}
 31 |	
 32 |float noise2(vec2 p){
 33 |	vec2 ip = floor(p);
 34 |	vec2 u = fract(p);
 35 |	u = u*u*(3.0-2.0*u);
 36 |	
 37 |	float res = mix(
 38 |		mix(rand(ip),rand(ip+vec2(1.0,0.0)),u.x),
 39 |		mix(rand(ip+vec2(0.0,1.0)),rand(ip+vec2(1.0,1.0)),u.x),u.y);
 40 |	return res*res;
 41 |}
 42 |
 43 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 44 |{
 45 |    p*=z;
 46 |    return fract(p);
 47 |}
 48 |
 49 |vec2 radialTile(vec2 _st, vec2 _vel, float _zoom){
 50 |  vec2 toExtreme = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 51 |  vec2 polar = vec2( (3.14+atan(toExtreme.y,toExtreme.x))/(2*3.14),   // Angle
 52 |                      log(length(toExtreme))*1.62*0.1);            // Radius
 53 |  polar *= _zoom;
 54 |
 55 |  polar.y += _vel.y;
 56 |  if (fract( polar.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 57 |    polar.x += _vel.x;
 58 |  } else {
 59 |    polar.x -= _vel.x;
 60 |  }
 61 |
 62 |  return fract(polar);
 63 |}
 64 |
 65 |float chaos (float timeX)
 66 |{
 67 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 68 |}
 69 |
 70 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 71 |{
 72 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 73 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 74 |
 75 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 76 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 77 |
 78 |  return pct0+pct1;
 79 |}
 80 |
 81 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 82 |    _st *= _zoom;
 83 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 84 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 85 |    }
 86 |    return fract(_st);
 87 |}

 89 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 90 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 91 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 92 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
 93 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
 94 |}

 96 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
 97 |  _st -= 0.5;
 98 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
 99 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
100 |  _st += 0.5;
101 |  return _st;
102 |}

104 |float circle(vec2 _st, float _radius){
105 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-_st;
106 |  return smoothstep(1.0-_radius,1.0-_radius+_radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
107 |}
108 |
109 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
110 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
111 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
112 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
113 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
114 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
115 |}

117 |vec2 offset(vec2 _st, vec2 _offset){
118 |  vec2 uv;
119 |  if(_st.x>0.5){
120 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
121 |  } else {
122 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
123 |  } 
124 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
125 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
126 |  }else {
127 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
128 |  } 
129 |  return uv;
130 |}
131 |
132 |vec2 movingTiles(vec2 _st, float _zoom, float _speed){
133 |  _st *= _zoom;
134 |  float time = timeV*_speed;
135 |  if( fract(time)>0.5 ){
136 |    if (fract( _st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
137 |      _st.x += fract(time)*2.0;
138 |    } else {
139 |      _st.x -= fract(time)*2.0;
140 |    } 
141 |  } else {
142 |    if (fract( _st.x * 0.5) > 0.5){
143 |      _st.y += fract(time)*2.0;
144 |    } else {
145 |        _st.y -= fract(time)*2.0;
146 |    } 
147 |  }
148 |  return fract(_st);
149 |}
150 |
151 |void main() { 
152 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
153 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
154 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
155 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
156 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
157 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
158 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
159 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
160 |
161 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
162 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
163 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
164 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
165 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
166 |
167 |    alpha*=10;
168 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
169 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
170 |
171 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
172 |
173 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
174 |    {
175 |    discard;
176 |    }
177 |  switch(int(swapColor))
178 |  {
179 |  case 0:
180 |    break;
181 |  case 1:
182 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
183 |    break;
184 |  case 2:
185 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
186 |    break;
187 |  case 3:
188 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
189 |    break;
190 |  case 4:
191 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
192 |    break;
193 |  case 5:
194 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
195 |    break;
196 |  case 6:
197 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
198 |    break;
199 |  default:
200 |    break;
201 |  };
202 |
203 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
204 |  if (flag)
205 |  {
206 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
207 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
208 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
209 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
210 |  switch(line)
211 |  {
212 |  case 0:
213 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
214 |    break;
215 |  case 1:
216 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
217 |    break;
218 |  case 2:
219 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
220 |    break;
221 |  case 3:
222 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
223 |    break;
224 |  default:
225 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
226 |    break;
227 |  };
228 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
229 |  };
230 |
231 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
232 |  switch (noiseIO)
233 |  {
234 |  case 0:
235 |    break;
236 |  case 1:
237 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
238 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
239 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
240 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
241 |    break;
242 |  case 2:
243 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
244 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
245 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
246 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
247 |    break;
248 |  case 3:
249 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
250 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
251 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
252 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
253 |    break;
254 |  case 4:
255 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
256 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
257 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
258 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
259 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
260 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
261 |    break;
262 |  case 5:
263 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
264 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
265 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF),0.01);
266 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01);
267 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
268 |    break;
269 |  case 6:
270 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
271 |    float angle = 3.14*0.25*cos(timeV*0.5);
272 |    float rows = 10;
273 |    if (fract(texCoordFrag.y * 0.5 * rows) > 0.5)
274 |    {
275 |      angle *= -1.0;
276 |    }
277 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,angle);
278 |    col2 *= 2.0;
279 |    float pct = (1.0+cos(3.14*col2.x))*0.5;
280 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
281 |    unit0.y = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
282 |    unit0.z = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
283 |    break;
284 |  case 7:
285 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*fract(timeV*0.1));
286 |    //col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
287 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(fract(timeV*0.5)),tilePPF+5);
288 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(-fract(timeV),0.0),tilePPF+2);
289 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF,1 - xPPF),0.01);
290 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF,1 - yPPF),0.01);
291 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF,1 - zPPF),0.01);
292 |    break;
293 |  case 8:
294 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*chaos(timeV));
295 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*chaos(timeV));
296 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*chaos(timeV));
297 |    break;
298 |  case 9:
299 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*noise(timeV));
300 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*noise(timeV));
301 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*noise(timeV));
302 |    break;
303 |  case 10:
304 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*noise2(col2));
305 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*noise2(col2));
306 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*noise2(col2));
307 |    break;
308 |  default:
309 |    break;
310 |  }
311 |
312 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
313 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
314 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
315 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
316 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
317 |}
318 |
