  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform int noiseIO;
 15 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 16 |uniform int tilePPF;
 17 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 18 |
 19 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 20 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 21 |
 22 |out vec4 fragColor;
 23 |
 24 |float rand(float n){return fract(sin(n) * 43758.5453123);}
 25 |
 26 |float noise(float p){
 27 |	float fl = floor(p);
 28 |  float fc = fract(p);
 29 |	return mix(rand(fl), rand(fl + 1.0), fc);
 30 |}
 31 |	
 32 |float noise(vec2 p, float freq ){
 33 |	float unit = screenWidth/freq;
 34 |	vec2 ij = floor(p/unit);
 35 |	vec2 xy = mod(p,unit)/unit;
 36 |	//xy = 3.*xy*xy-2.*xy*xy*xy;
 37 |	xy = .5*(1.-cos(PI*xy));
 38 |	float a = rand((ij+vec2(0.,0.)));
 39 |	float b = rand((ij+vec2(1.,0.)));
 40 |	float c = rand((ij+vec2(0.,1.)));
 41 |	float d = rand((ij+vec2(1.,1.)));
 42 |	float x1 = mix(a, b, xy.x);
 43 |	float x2 = mix(c, d, xy.x);
 44 |	return mix(x1, x2, xy.y);
 45 |}
 46 |
 47 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 48 |{
 49 |    p*=z;
 50 |    return fract(p);
 51 |}
 52 |
 53 |vec2 radialTile(vec2 _st, vec2 _vel, float _zoom){
 54 |  vec2 toExtreme = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 55 |  vec2 polar = vec2( (3.14+atan(toExtreme.y,toExtreme.x))/(2*3.14),   // Angle
 56 |                      log(length(toExtreme))*1.62*0.1);            // Radius
 57 |  polar *= _zoom;
 58 |
 59 |  polar.y += _vel.y;
 60 |  if (fract( polar.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 61 |    polar.x += _vel.x;
 62 |  } else {
 63 |    polar.x -= _vel.x;
 64 |  }
 65 |
 66 |  return fract(polar);
 67 |}
 68 |
 69 |float chaos (float timeX)
 70 |{
 71 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 72 |}
 73 |
 74 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 75 |{
 76 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 77 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 78 |
 79 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 80 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 81 |
 82 |  return pct0+pct1;
 83 |}
 84 |
 85 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 86 |    _st *= _zoom;
 87 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 88 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 89 |    }
 90 |    return fract(_st);
 91 |}
 92 |
 93 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 94 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 95 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 96 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
 97 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
 98 |}
 99 |
100 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
101 |  _st -= 0.5;
102 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
103 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
104 |  _st += 0.5;
105 |  return _st;
106 |}
107 |
108 |float circle(vec2 _st, float _radius){
109 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-_st;
110 |  return smoothstep(1.0-_radius,1.0-_radius+_radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
111 |}
112 |
113 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
114 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
115 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
116 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
117 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
118 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
119 |}
120 |
121 |vec2 offset(vec2 _st, vec2 _offset){
122 |  vec2 uv;
123 |  if(_st.x>0.5){
124 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
125 |  } else {
126 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
127 |  } 
128 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
129 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
130 |  }else {
131 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
132 |  } 
133 |  return uv;
134 |}
135 |
136 |vec2 movingTiles(vec2 _st, float _zoom, float _speed){
137 |  _st *= _zoom;
138 |  float time = timeV*_speed;
139 |  if( fract(time)>0.5 ){
140 |    if (fract( _st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
141 |      _st.x += fract(time)*2.0;
142 |    } else {
143 |      _st.x -= fract(time)*2.0;
144 |    } 
145 |  } else {
146 |    if (fract( _st.x * 0.5) > 0.5){
147 |      _st.y += fract(time)*2.0;
148 |    } else {
149 |        _st.y -= fract(time)*2.0;
150 |    } 
151 |  }
152 |  return fract(_st);
153 |}
154 |
155 |void main() { 
156 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
157 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
158 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
159 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
160 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
161 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
162 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
163 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
164 |
165 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
166 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
167 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
168 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
169 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
170 |
171 |    alpha*=10;
172 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
173 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
174 |
175 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
176 |
177 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
178 |    {
179 |    discard;
180 |    }
181 |  switch(int(swapColor))
182 |  {
183 |  case 0:
184 |    break;
185 |  case 1:
186 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
187 |    break;
188 |  case 2:
189 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
190 |    break;
191 |  case 3:
192 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
193 |    break;
194 |  case 4:
195 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
196 |    break;
197 |  case 5:
198 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
199 |    break;
200 |  case 6:
201 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
202 |    break;
203 |  default:
204 |    break;
205 |  };
206 |
207 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
208 |  if (flag)
209 |  {
210 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
211 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
212 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
213 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
214 |  switch(line)
215 |  {
216 |  case 0:
217 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
218 |    break;
219 |  case 1:
220 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
221 |    break;
222 |  case 2:
223 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
224 |    break;
225 |  case 3:
226 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
227 |    break;
228 |  default:
229 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
230 |    break;
231 |  };
232 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
233 |  };
234 |
235 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
236 |  switch (noiseIO)
237 |  {
238 |  case 0:
239 |    break;
240 |  case 1:
241 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
242 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
243 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
244 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
245 |    break;
246 |  case 2:
247 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
248 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
249 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
250 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
251 |    break;
252 |  case 3:
253 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
254 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
255 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
256 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
257 |    break;
258 |  case 4:
259 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
260 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
261 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
262 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
263 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
264 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
265 |    break;
266 |  case 5:
267 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
268 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
269 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF),0.01);
270 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01);
271 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
272 |    break;
273 |  case 6:
274 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
275 |    float angle = 3.14*0.25*cos(timeV*0.5);
276 |    float rows = 10;
277 |    if (fract(texCoordFrag.y * 0.5 * rows) > 0.5)
278 |    {
279 |      angle *= -1.0;
280 |    }
281 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,angle);
282 |    col2 *= 2.0;
283 |    float pct = (1.0+cos(3.14*col2.x))*0.5;
284 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
285 |    unit0.y = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
286 |    unit0.z = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
287 |    break;
288 |  case 7:
289 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*fract(timeV*0.1));
290 |    //col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
291 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(fract(timeV*0.5)),tilePPF+5);
292 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(-fract(timeV),0.0),tilePPF+2);
293 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF,1 - xPPF),0.01);
294 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF,1 - yPPF),0.01);
295 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF,1 - zPPF),0.01);
296 |    break;
297 |  case 8:
298 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*chaos(timeV));
299 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*chaos(timeV));
300 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*chaos(timeV));
301 |    break;
302 |  case 9:
303 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*noise(timeV));
304 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*noise(timeV));
305 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*noise(timeV));
306 |    break;
307 |  case 10:
308 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*noise2(col2));
309 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*noise2(col2));
310 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*noise2(col2));
311 |    break;
312 |  default:
313 |    break;
314 |  }
315 |
316 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
317 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
318 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
319 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
320 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
321 |}
322 |

  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform int noiseIO;
 15 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 16 |uniform int tilePPF;
 17 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 18 |
 19 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 20 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 21 |
 22 |out vec4 fragColor;
 23 |
 24 |float rand(float n){return fract(sin(n) * 43758.5453123);}
 25 |
 26 |float noise(float p){
 27 |	float fl = floor(p);
 28 |  float fc = fract(p);
 29 |	return mix(rand(fl), rand(fl + 1.0), fc);
 30 |}
 31 |	
 32 |float pNoise(vec2 p, int res){
 33 |	float persistance = .5;
 34 |	float n = 0.;
 35 |	float normK = 0.;
 36 |	float f = 4.;
 37 |	float amp = 1.;
 38 |	int iCount = 0;
 39 |	for (int i = 0; i<50; i++){
 40 |		n+=amp*noise(p, f);
 41 |		f*=2.;
 42 |		normK+=amp;
 43 |		amp*=persistance;
 44 |		if (iCount == res) break;
 45 |		iCount++;
 46 |	}
 47 |	float nf = n/normK;
 48 |	return nf*nf*nf*nf;
 49 |}
 50 |
 51 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 52 |{
 53 |    p*=z;
 54 |    return fract(p);
 55 |}
 56 |
 57 |vec2 radialTile(vec2 _st, vec2 _vel, float _zoom){
 58 |  vec2 toExtreme = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 59 |  vec2 polar = vec2( (3.14+atan(toExtreme.y,toExtreme.x))/(2*3.14),   // Angle
 60 |                      log(length(toExtreme))*1.62*0.1);            // Radius
 61 |  polar *= _zoom;
 62 |
 63 |  polar.y += _vel.y;
 64 |  if (fract( polar.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 65 |    polar.x += _vel.x;
 66 |  } else {
 67 |    polar.x -= _vel.x;
 68 |  }
 69 |
 70 |  return fract(polar);
 71 |}
 72 |
 73 |float chaos (float timeX)
 74 |{
 75 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 76 |}
 77 |
 78 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 79 |{
 80 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 81 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 82 |
 83 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 84 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 85 |
 86 |  return pct0+pct1;
 87 |}
 88 |
 89 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 90 |    _st *= _zoom;
 91 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 92 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 93 |    }
 94 |    return fract(_st);
 95 |}
 96 |
 97 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 98 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 99 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
100 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
101 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
102 |}
103 |
104 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
105 |  _st -= 0.5;
106 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
107 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
108 |  _st += 0.5;
109 |  return _st;
110 |}
111 |
112 |float circle(vec2 _st, float _radius){
113 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-_st;
114 |  return smoothstep(1.0-_radius,1.0-_radius+_radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
115 |}
116 |
117 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
118 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
119 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
120 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
121 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
122 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
123 |}
124 |
125 |vec2 offset(vec2 _st, vec2 _offset){
126 |  vec2 uv;
127 |  if(_st.x>0.5){
128 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
129 |  } else {
130 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
131 |  } 
132 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
133 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
134 |  }else {
135 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
136 |  } 
137 |  return uv;
138 |}
139 |
140 |vec2 movingTiles(vec2 _st, float _zoom, float _speed){
141 |  _st *= _zoom;
142 |  float time = timeV*_speed;
143 |  if( fract(time)>0.5 ){
144 |    if (fract( _st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
145 |      _st.x += fract(time)*2.0;
146 |    } else {
147 |      _st.x -= fract(time)*2.0;
148 |    } 
149 |  } else {
150 |    if (fract( _st.x * 0.5) > 0.5){
151 |      _st.y += fract(time)*2.0;
152 |    } else {
153 |        _st.y -= fract(time)*2.0;
154 |    } 
155 |  }
156 |  return fract(_st);
157 |}
158 |
159 |void main() { 
160 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
161 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
162 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
163 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
164 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
165 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
166 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
167 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
168 |
169 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
170 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
171 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
172 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
173 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
174 |
175 |    alpha*=10;
176 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
177 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
178 |
179 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
180 |
181 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
182 |    {
183 |    discard;
184 |    }
185 |  switch(int(swapColor))
186 |  {
187 |  case 0:
188 |    break;
189 |  case 1:
190 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
191 |    break;
192 |  case 2:
193 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
194 |    break;
195 |  case 3:
196 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
197 |    break;
198 |  case 4:
199 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
200 |    break;
201 |  case 5:
202 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
203 |    break;
204 |  case 6:
205 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
206 |    break;
207 |  default:
208 |    break;
209 |  };
210 |
211 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
212 |  if (flag)
213 |  {
214 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
215 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
216 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
217 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
218 |  switch(line)
219 |  {
220 |  case 0:
221 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
222 |    break;
223 |  case 1:
224 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
225 |    break;
226 |  case 2:
227 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
228 |    break;
229 |  case 3:
230 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
231 |    break;
232 |  default:
233 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
234 |    break;
235 |  };
236 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
237 |  };
238 |
239 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
240 |  switch (noiseIO)
241 |  {
242 |  case 0:
243 |    break;
244 |  case 1:
245 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
246 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
247 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
248 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
249 |    break;
250 |  case 2:
251 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
252 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
253 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
254 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
255 |    break;
256 |  case 3:
257 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
258 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
259 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
260 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
261 |    break;
262 |  case 4:
263 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
264 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
265 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
266 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
267 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
268 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
269 |    break;
270 |  case 5:
271 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
272 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
273 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF),0.01);
274 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01);
275 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
276 |    break;
277 |  case 6:
278 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
279 |    float angle = 3.14*0.25*cos(timeV*0.5);
280 |    float rows = 10;
281 |    if (fract(texCoordFrag.y * 0.5 * rows) > 0.5)
282 |    {
283 |      angle *= -1.0;
284 |    }
285 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,angle);
286 |    col2 *= 2.0;
287 |    float pct = (1.0+cos(3.14*col2.x))*0.5;
288 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
289 |    unit0.y = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
290 |    unit0.z = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
291 |    break;
292 |  case 7:
293 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*fract(timeV*0.1));
294 |    //col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
295 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(fract(timeV*0.5)),tilePPF+5);
296 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(-fract(timeV),0.0),tilePPF+2);
297 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF,1 - xPPF),0.01);
298 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF,1 - yPPF),0.01);
299 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF,1 - zPPF),0.01);
300 |    break;
301 |  case 8:
302 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*chaos(timeV));
303 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*chaos(timeV));
304 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*chaos(timeV));
305 |    break;
306 |  case 9:
307 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*noise(timeV));
308 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*noise(timeV));
309 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*noise(timeV));
310 |    break;
311 |  case 10:
312 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*noise2(col2));
313 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*noise2(col2));
314 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*noise2(col2));
315 |    break;
316 |  default:
317 |    break;
318 |  }
319 |
320 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
321 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
322 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
323 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
324 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
325 |}

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform int noiseIO;
 15 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 16 |uniform int tilePPF;
 17 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 18 |
 19 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 20 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 21 |
 22 |out vec4 fragColor;
 23 |
 24 |float rand(float n){return fract(sin(n) * 43758.5453123);}
 25 |
 26 |float noiseOne(float p){
 27 |	float fl = floor(p);
 28 |  float fc = fract(p);
 29 |	return mix(rand(fl), rand(fl + 1.0), fc);
 30 |}
 31 |
 32 |float noise(vec2 p, float freq ){
 33 |	float unit = screenWidth/freq;
 34 |	vec2 ij = floor(p/unit);
 35 |	vec2 xy = mod(p,unit)/unit;
 36 |	//xy = 3.*xy*xy-2.*xy*xy*xy;
 37 |	xy = .5*(1.-cos(PI*xy));
 38 |	float a = rand((ij+vec2(0.,0.)));
 39 |	float b = rand((ij+vec2(1.,0.)));
 40 |	float c = rand((ij+vec2(0.,1.)));
 41 |	float d = rand((ij+vec2(1.,1.)));
 42 |	float x1 = mix(a, b, xy.x);
 43 |	float x2 = mix(c, d, xy.x);
 44 |	return mix(x1, x2, xy.y);
 45 |}
 46 |	
 47 |float pNoise(vec2 p, int res){
 48 |	float persistance = .5;
 49 |	float n = 0.;
 50 |	float normK = 0.;
 51 |	float f = 4.;
 52 |	float amp = 1.;
 53 |	int iCount = 0;
 54 |	for (int i = 0; i<50; i++){
 55 |		n+=amp*noise(p, f);
 56 |		f*=2.;
 57 |		normK+=amp;
 58 |		amp*=persistance;
 59 |		if (iCount == res) break;
 60 |		iCount++;
 61 |	}
 62 |	float nf = n/normK;
 63 |	return nf*nf*nf*nf;
 64 |}
 65 |
 66 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 67 |{
 68 |    p*=z;
 69 |    return fract(p);
 70 |}
 71 |
 72 |vec2 radialTile(vec2 _st, vec2 _vel, float _zoom){
 73 |  vec2 toExtreme = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 74 |  vec2 polar = vec2( (3.14+atan(toExtreme.y,toExtreme.x))/(2*3.14),   // Angle
 75 |                      log(length(toExtreme))*1.62*0.1);            // Radius
 76 |  polar *= _zoom;
 77 |
 78 |  polar.y += _vel.y;
 79 |  if (fract( polar.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 80 |    polar.x += _vel.x;
 81 |  } else {
 82 |    polar.x -= _vel.x;
 83 |  }
 84 |
 85 |  return fract(polar);
 86 |}
 87 |
 88 |float chaos (float timeX)
 89 |{
 90 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 91 |}
 92 |
 93 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 94 |{
 95 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 96 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 97 |
 98 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 99 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
100 |
101 |  return pct0+pct1;
102 |}
103 |
104 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
105 |    _st *= _zoom;
106 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
107 |        _st.x += 0.5;
108 |    }
109 |    return fract(_st);
110 |}
111 |
112 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
113 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
114 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
115 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
116 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
117 |}
118 |
119 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
120 |  _st -= 0.5;
121 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
122 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
123 |  _st += 0.5;
124 |  return _st;
125 |}
126 |
127 |float circle(vec2 _st, float _radius){
128 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-_st;
129 |  return smoothstep(1.0-_radius,1.0-_radius+_radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
130 |}
131 |
132 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
133 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
134 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
135 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
136 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
137 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
138 |}
139 |
140 |vec2 offset(vec2 _st, vec2 _offset){
141 |  vec2 uv;
142 |  if(_st.x>0.5){
143 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
144 |  } else {
145 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
146 |  } 
147 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
148 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
149 |  }else {
150 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
151 |  } 
152 |  return uv;
153 |}
154 |
155 |vec2 movingTiles(vec2 _st, float _zoom, float _speed){
156 |  _st *= _zoom;
157 |  float time = timeV*_speed;
158 |  if( fract(time)>0.5 ){
159 |    if (fract( _st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
160 |      _st.x += fract(time)*2.0;
161 |    } else {
162 |      _st.x -= fract(time)*2.0;
163 |    } 
164 |  } else {
165 |    if (fract( _st.x * 0.5) > 0.5){
166 |      _st.y += fract(time)*2.0;
167 |    } else {
168 |        _st.y -= fract(time)*2.0;
169 |    } 
170 |  }
171 |  return fract(_st);
172 |}
173 |
174 |void main() { 
175 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
176 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
177 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
178 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
179 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
180 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
181 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
182 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
183 |
184 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
185 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
186 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
187 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
188 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
189 |
190 |    alpha*=10;
191 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
192 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
193 |
194 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
195 |
196 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
197 |    {
198 |    discard;
199 |    }
200 |  switch(int(swapColor))
201 |  {
202 |  case 0:
203 |    break;
204 |  case 1:
205 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
206 |    break;
207 |  case 2:
208 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
209 |    break;
210 |  case 3:
211 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
212 |    break;
213 |  case 4:
214 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
215 |    break;
216 |  case 5:
217 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
218 |    break;
219 |  case 6:
220 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
221 |    break;
222 |  default:
223 |    break;
224 |  };
225 |
226 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
227 |  if (flag)
228 |  {
229 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
230 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
231 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
232 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
233 |  switch(line)
234 |  {
235 |  case 0:
236 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
237 |    break;
238 |  case 1:
239 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
240 |    break;
241 |  case 2:
242 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
243 |    break;
244 |  case 3:
245 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
246 |    break;
247 |  default:
248 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
249 |    break;
250 |  };
251 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
252 |  };
253 |
254 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
255 |  switch (noiseIO)
256 |  {
257 |  case 0:
258 |    break;
259 |  case 1:
260 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
261 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
262 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
263 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
264 |    break;
265 |  case 2:
266 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
267 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
268 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
269 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
270 |    break;
271 |  case 3:
272 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
273 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
274 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
275 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
276 |    break;
277 |  case 4:
278 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
279 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
280 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
281 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
282 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
283 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
284 |    break;
285 |  case 5:
286 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
287 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
288 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF),0.01);
289 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01);
290 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
291 |    break;
292 |  case 6:
293 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
294 |    float angle = 3.14*0.25*cos(timeV*0.5);
295 |    float rows = 10;
296 |    if (fract(texCoordFrag.y * 0.5 * rows) > 0.5)
297 |    {
298 |      angle *= -1.0;
299 |    }
300 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,angle);
301 |    col2 *= 2.0;
302 |    float pct = (1.0+cos(3.14*col2.x))*0.5;
303 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
304 |    unit0.y = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
305 |    unit0.z = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
306 |    break;
307 |  case 7:
308 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*fract(timeV*0.1));
309 |    //col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
310 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(fract(timeV*0.5)),tilePPF+5);
311 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(-fract(timeV),0.0),tilePPF+2);
312 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF,1 - xPPF),0.01);
313 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF,1 - yPPF),0.01);
314 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF,1 - zPPF),0.01);
315 |    break;
316 |  case 8:
317 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*chaos(timeV));
318 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*chaos(timeV));
319 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*chaos(timeV));
320 |    break;
321 |  case 9:
322 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*noise(timeV));
323 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*noise(timeV));
324 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*noise(timeV));
325 |    break;
326 |  case 10:
327 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*noise2(col2));
328 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*noise2(col2));
329 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*noise2(col2));
330 |    break;
331 |  default:
332 |    break;
333 |  }
334 |
335 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
336 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
337 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
338 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
339 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
340 |}
341 |

 32 |float random (vec2 st) {
 33 |    return fract(sin(dot(st.xy,
 34 |                         vec2(12.9898,78.233)))*
 35 |        43758.5453123);
 36 |}

 38 |vec2 truchetPattern(in vec2 _st, in float _index){
 39 |    _index = fract(((_index-0.5)*2.0));
 40 |    if (_index > 0.75) {
 41 |        _st = vec2(1.0) - _st;
 42 |    } else if (_index > 0.5) {
 43 |        _st = vec2(1.0-_st.x,_st.y);
 44 |    } else if (_index > 0.25) {
 45 |        _st = 1.0-vec2(1.0-_st.x,_st.y);
 46 |    }
 47 |    return _st;
 48 |}
 49 |
 50 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 51 |{
 52 |    p*=z;
 53 |    return fract(p);
 54 |}
 55 |
 56 |vec2 radialTile(vec2 _st, vec2 _vel, float _zoom){
 57 |  vec2 toExtreme = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 58 |  vec2 polar = vec2( (3.14+atan(toExtreme.y,toExtreme.x))/(2*3.14),   // Angle
 59 |                      log(length(toExtreme))*1.62*0.1);            // Radius
 60 |  polar *= _zoom;
 61 |
 62 |  polar.y += _vel.y;
 63 |  if (fract( polar.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 64 |    polar.x += _vel.x;
 65 |  } else {
 66 |    polar.x -= _vel.x;
 67 |  }
 68 |
 69 |  return fract(polar);
 70 |}

 74 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);

 77 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 78 |{
 79 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 80 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 81 |
 82 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 83 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 84 |
 85 |  return pct0+pct1;
 86 |}

 88 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 89 |    _st *= _zoom;
 90 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 91 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 92 |    }
 93 |    return fract(_st);
 94 |}
 95 |
 96 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 97 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 98 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 99 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
100 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
101 |}
102 |
103 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
104 |  _st -= 0.5;
105 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
106 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
107 |  _st += 0.5;
108 |  return _st;
109 |}
110 |
111 |float circle(vec2 _st, float _radius){
112 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-_st;
113 |  return smoothstep(1.0-_radius,1.0-_radius+_radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
114 |}
115 |
116 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
117 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
118 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
119 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
120 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
121 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
122 |}
123 |
124 |vec2 offset(vec2 _st, vec2 _offset){
125 |  vec2 uv;
126 |  if(_st.x>0.5){
127 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
128 |  } else {
129 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
130 |  } 
131 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
132 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
133 |  }else {
134 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
135 |  } 
136 |  return uv;
137 |}
138 |
139 |vec2 movingTiles(vec2 _st, float _zoom, float _speed){
140 |  _st *= _zoom;
141 |  float time = timeV*_speed;
142 |  if( fract(time)>0.5 ){
143 |    if (fract( _st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
144 |      _st.x += fract(time)*2.0;
145 |    } else {
146 |      _st.x -= fract(time)*2.0;
147 |    } 
148 |  } else {
149 |    if (fract( _st.x * 0.5) > 0.5){
150 |      _st.y += fract(time)*2.0;
151 |    } else {
152 |        _st.y -= fract(time)*2.0;
153 |    } 
154 |  }
155 |  return fract(_st);
156 |}
157 |
158 |void main() { 
159 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
160 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
161 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
162 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
163 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
164 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
165 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
166 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
167 |
168 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
169 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
170 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
171 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
172 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
173 |
174 |    alpha*=10;
175 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
176 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
177 |
178 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
179 |
180 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
181 |    {
182 |    discard;
183 |    }
184 |  switch(int(swapColor))
185 |  {
186 |  case 0:
187 |    break;
188 |  case 1:
189 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
190 |    break;
191 |  case 2:
192 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
193 |    break;
194 |  case 3:
195 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
196 |    break;
197 |  case 4:
198 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
199 |    break;
200 |  case 5:
201 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
202 |    break;
203 |  case 6:
204 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
205 |    break;
206 |  default:
207 |    break;
208 |  };
209 |
210 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
211 |  if (flag)
212 |  {
213 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
214 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
215 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
216 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
217 |  switch(line)
218 |  {
219 |  case 0:
220 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
221 |    break;
222 |  case 1:
223 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
224 |    break;
225 |  case 2:
226 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
227 |    break;
228 |  case 3:
229 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
230 |    break;
231 |  default:
232 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
233 |    break;
234 |  };
235 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
236 |  };
237 |
238 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
239 |  switch (noiseIO)
240 |  {
241 |  case 0:
242 |    break;
243 |  case 1:
244 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
245 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
246 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
247 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
248 |    break;
249 |  case 2:
250 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
251 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
252 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
253 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
254 |    break;
255 |  case 3:
256 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
257 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
258 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
259 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
260 |    break;
261 |  case 4:
262 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
263 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
264 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
265 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
266 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
267 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
268 |    break;
269 |  case 5:
270 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
271 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
272 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF),0.01);
273 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01);
274 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
275 |    break;
276 |  case 6:
277 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
278 |    float angle = 3.14*0.25*cos(timeV*0.5);
279 |    float rows = 10;
280 |    if (fract(texCoordFrag.y * 0.5 * rows) > 0.5)
281 |    {
282 |      angle *= -1.0;
283 |    }
284 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,angle);
285 |    col2 *= 2.0;
286 |    float pct = (1.0+cos(3.14*col2.x))*0.5;
287 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
288 |    unit0.y = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
289 |    unit0.z = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
290 |    break;
291 |  case 7:
292 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*fract(timeV*0.1));
293 |    //col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
294 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(fract(timeV*0.5)),tilePPF+5);
295 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(-fract(timeV),0.0),tilePPF+2);
296 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF,1 - xPPF),0.01);
297 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF,1 - yPPF),0.01);
298 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF,1 - zPPF),0.01);
299 |    break;
300 |  case 8:
301 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*chaos(timeV));
302 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*chaos(timeV));
303 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*chaos(timeV));
304 |    break;
305 |  case 9:
306 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*noiseOne(timeV));
307 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*noiseOne(timeV));
308 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*noiseOne(timeV));
309 |    break;
310 |  case 10:
311 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*random(col2));
312 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*random(col2));
313 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*random(col2));
314 |    break;
315 |  case 11:
316 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
317 |    vec2 ipos = floor(col2);
318 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*random( ipos ));
319 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*random( ipos ));
320 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*random( ipos ));
321 |    break;
322 |  case 12:
323 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
324 |    vec2 fpos = fract(col2);
325 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*fpos.x);
326 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*fpos.y);
327 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*0.01);
328 |    break;
329 |  case 13:
330 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
331 |    // st = (st-vec2(5.0))*(abs(sin(u_time*0.2))*5.);
332 |    // st.x += u_time*3.0;
333 |
334 |    vec2 ipos = floor(col2);  // integer
335 |    vec2 fpos = fract(col2);  // fraction
336 |
337 |    vec2 tile = truchetPattern(fpos, random( ipos ));
338 |
339 |    float color = 0.0;
340 |
341 |    // Maze
342 |    color = smoothstep(tile.x-0.3,tile.x,tile.y)-
343 |            smoothstep(tile.x,tile.x+0.3,tile.y);
344 |
345 |    // Circles
346 |    // color = (step(length(tile),0.6) -
347 |    //          step(length(tile),0.4) ) +
348 |    //         (step(length(tile-vec2(1.)),0.6) -
349 |    //          step(length(tile-vec2(1.)),0.4) );
350 |
351 |    // Truchet (2 triangles)
352 |    // color = step(tile.x,tile.y);
353 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*color);
354 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*color);
355 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*color);
356 |    break;
357 |  default:
358 |    break;
359 |  }
360 |
361 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
362 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
363 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
364 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
365 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
366 |}
367 |

[Mon Apr 20 00:58:59 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(344) : error C1038: declaration of "tile" conflicts with previous declaration at 0(331)
0(359) : error C1038: declaration of "tile" conflicts with previous declaration at 0(331)

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |uniform sampler2D texUnit20;
  5 |uniform sampler2D texUnit21;
  6 |uniform sampler2D texUnit22;
  7 |uniform sampler2D texUnit23;
  8 |uniform sampler2D texUnit24;
  9 |
 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform int noiseIO;
 15 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 16 |uniform int tilePPF;
 17 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 18 |
 19 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 20 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 21 |
 22 |out vec4 fragColor;
 23 |
 24 |float rand(float n){return fract(sin(n) * 43758.5453123);}
 25 |
 26 |float noiseOne(float p){
 27 |	float fl = floor(p);
 28 |  float fc = fract(p);
 29 |	return mix(rand(fl), rand(fl + 1.0), fc);
 30 |}
 31 |	
 32 |float random (vec2 st) {
 33 |    return fract(sin(dot(st.xy,
 34 |                         vec2(12.9898,78.233)))*
 35 |        43758.5453123);
 36 |}
 37 |
 38 |vec2 truchetPattern(in vec2 _st, in float _index){
 39 |    _index = fract(((_index-0.5)*2.0));
 40 |    if (_index > 0.75) {
 41 |        _st = vec2(1.0) - _st;
 42 |    } else if (_index > 0.5) {
 43 |        _st = vec2(1.0-_st.x,_st.y);
 44 |    } else if (_index > 0.25) {
 45 |        _st = 1.0-vec2(1.0-_st.x,_st.y);
 46 |    }
 47 |    return _st;
 48 |}
 49 |
 50 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 51 |{
 52 |    p*=z;
 53 |    return fract(p);
 54 |}
 55 |
 56 |vec2 radialTile(vec2 _st, vec2 _vel, float _zoom){
 57 |  vec2 toExtreme = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 58 |  vec2 polar = vec2( (3.14+atan(toExtreme.y,toExtreme.x))/(2*3.14),   // Angle
 59 |                      log(length(toExtreme))*1.62*0.1);            // Radius
 60 |  polar *= _zoom;
 61 |
 62 |  polar.y += _vel.y;
 63 |  if (fract( polar.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 64 |    polar.x += _vel.x;
 65 |  } else {
 66 |    polar.x -= _vel.x;
 67 |  }
 68 |
 69 |  return fract(polar);
 70 |}
 71 |
 72 |float chaos (float timeX)
 73 |{
 74 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 75 |}
 76 |
 77 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 78 |{
 79 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 80 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 81 |
 82 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 83 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 84 |
 85 |  return pct0+pct1;
 86 |}
 87 |
 88 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 89 |    _st *= _zoom;
 90 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 91 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 92 |    }
 93 |    return fract(_st);
 94 |}
 95 |
 96 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 97 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 98 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 99 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
100 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
101 |}
102 |
103 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
104 |  _st -= 0.5;
105 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
106 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
107 |  _st += 0.5;
108 |  return _st;
109 |}
110 |
111 |float circle(vec2 _st, float _radius){
112 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-_st;
113 |  return smoothstep(1.0-_radius,1.0-_radius+_radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
114 |}
115 |
116 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
117 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
118 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
119 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
120 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
121 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
122 |}
123 |
124 |vec2 offset(vec2 _st, vec2 _offset){
125 |  vec2 uv;
126 |  if(_st.x>0.5){
127 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
128 |  } else {
129 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
130 |  } 
131 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
132 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
133 |  }else {
134 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
135 |  } 
136 |  return uv;
137 |}
138 |
139 |vec2 movingTiles(vec2 _st, float _zoom, float _speed){
140 |  _st *= _zoom;
141 |  float time = timeV*_speed;
142 |  if( fract(time)>0.5 ){
143 |    if (fract( _st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
144 |      _st.x += fract(time)*2.0;
145 |    } else {
146 |      _st.x -= fract(time)*2.0;
147 |    } 
148 |  } else {
149 |    if (fract( _st.x * 0.5) > 0.5){
150 |      _st.y += fract(time)*2.0;
151 |    } else {
152 |        _st.y -= fract(time)*2.0;
153 |    } 
154 |  }
155 |  return fract(_st);
156 |}
157 |
158 |void main() { 
159 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
160 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
161 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
162 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
163 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
164 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
165 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
166 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
167 |
168 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
169 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
170 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
171 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
172 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
173 |
174 |    alpha*=10;
175 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
176 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
177 |
178 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
179 |
180 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
181 |    {
182 |    discard;
183 |    }
184 |  switch(int(swapColor))
185 |  {
186 |  case 0:
187 |    break;
188 |  case 1:
189 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
190 |    break;
191 |  case 2:
192 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
193 |    break;
194 |  case 3:
195 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
196 |    break;
197 |  case 4:
198 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
199 |    break;
200 |  case 5:
201 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
202 |    break;
203 |  case 6:
204 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
205 |    break;
206 |  default:
207 |    break;
208 |  };
209 |
210 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
211 |  if (flag)
212 |  {
213 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
214 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
215 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
216 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
217 |  switch(line)
218 |  {
219 |  case 0:
220 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
221 |    break;
222 |  case 1:
223 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
224 |    break;
225 |  case 2:
226 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
227 |    break;
228 |  case 3:
229 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
230 |    break;
231 |  default:
232 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
233 |    break;
234 |  };
235 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
236 |  };
237 |
238 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
239 |  vec2 ipos = vec2(0,0);
240 |  vec2 fpos = vec2(0,0);
241 |  float color= 0.0f;
242 |  switch (noiseIO)
243 |  {
244 |  case 0:
245 |    break;
246 |  case 1:
247 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
248 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
249 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
250 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
251 |    break;
252 |  case 2:
253 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
254 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
255 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
256 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
257 |    break;
258 |  case 3:
259 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
260 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
261 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
262 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
263 |    break;
264 |  case 4:
265 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
266 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
267 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
268 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
269 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
270 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
271 |    break;
272 |  case 5:
273 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
274 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
275 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF),0.01);
276 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01);
277 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
278 |    break;
279 |  case 6:
280 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
281 |    float angle = 3.14*0.25*cos(timeV*0.5);
282 |    float rows = 10;
283 |    if (fract(texCoordFrag.y * 0.5 * rows) > 0.5)
284 |    {
285 |      angle *= -1.0;
286 |    }
287 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,angle);
288 |    col2 *= 2.0;
289 |    float pct = (1.0+cos(3.14*col2.x))*0.5;
290 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
291 |    unit0.y = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
292 |    unit0.z = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
293 |    break;
294 |  case 7:
295 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*fract(timeV*0.1));
296 |    //col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
297 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(fract(timeV*0.5)),tilePPF+5);
298 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(-fract(timeV),0.0),tilePPF+2);
299 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF,1 - xPPF),0.01);
300 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF,1 - yPPF),0.01);
301 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF,1 - zPPF),0.01);
302 |    break;
303 |  case 8:
304 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*chaos(timeV));
305 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*chaos(timeV));
306 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*chaos(timeV));
307 |    break;
308 |  case 9:
309 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*random(col2));
310 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*random(col2));
311 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*random(col2));
312 |    break;
313 |  case 10:
314 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
315 |    ipos = floor(col2);
316 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*random( ipos ));
317 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*random( ipos ));
318 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*random( ipos ));
319 |    break;
320 |  case 11:
321 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
322 |    fpos = fract(col2);
323 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*fpos.x);
324 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*fpos.y);
325 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*0.01);
326 |    break;
327 |  case 12:
328 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
329 |    ipos = floor(col2);
330 |    fpos = fract(col2);
331 |    vec2 tile = truchetPattern(fpos, random( ipos ));
332 |    color = smoothstep(tile.x-0.3,tile.x,tile.y)-
333 |            smoothstep(tile.x,tile.x+0.3,tile.y);
334 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*color);
335 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*color);
336 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*color);
337 |    break;
338 |  case 13:
339 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
340 |    col2 = (col2-vec2(5.0))*(abs(sin(timeV*0.2))*5.);
341 |    col2.x += timeV*3.0;
342 |    ipos = floor(col2);
343 |    fpos = fract(col2);
344 |    vec2 tile = truchetPattern(fpos, random( ipos ));
345 |    color = (step(length(tile),0.6) -
346 |              step(length(tile),0.4) ) +
347 |             (step(length(tile-vec2(1.)),0.6) -
348 |              step(length(tile-vec2(1.)),0.4) );
349 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*color);
350 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*color);
351 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*color);
352 |    break;
353 |  case 13:
354 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
355 |    col2 = (col2-vec2(5.0))*(abs(sin(timeV*0.2))*5.);
356 |    col2.x += timeV*3.0;
357 |    ipos = floor(col2);
358 |    fpos = fract(col2);
359 |    vec2 tile = truchetPattern(fpos, random( ipos ));
360 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*step(tile.x,tile.y));
361 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*step(tile.x,tile.y));
362 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*step(tile.x,tile.y));
363 |    break;
364 |  default:
365 |    break;
366 |  }
367 |
368 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
369 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
370 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
371 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
372 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
373 |}
374 |

 10 |uniform int swapColor;
 11 |uniform float TVflag;
 12 |uniform float bright;
 13 |uniform float timeV;
 14 |uniform int noiseIO;
 15 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 16 |uniform int tilePPF;
 17 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 18 |
 19 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 20 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 21 |
 22 |out vec4 fragColor;
 23 |
 24 |float rand(float n){return fract(sin(n) * 43758.5453123);}
 25 |
 26 |float noiseOne(float p){
 27 |	float fl = floor(p);
 28 |  float fc = fract(p);
 29 |	return mix(rand(fl), rand(fl + 1.0), fc);
 30 |}
 31 |	
 32 |float random (vec2 st) {
 33 |    return fract(sin(dot(st.xy,
 34 |                         vec2(12.9898,78.233)))*
 35 |        43758.5453123);
 36 |}
 37 |
 38 |vec2 truchetPattern(in vec2 _st, in float _index){
 39 |    _index = fract(((_index-0.5)*2.0));
 40 |    if (_index > 0.75) {
 41 |        _st = vec2(1.0) - _st;
 42 |    } else if (_index > 0.5) {
 43 |        _st = vec2(1.0-_st.x,_st.y);
 44 |    } else if (_index > 0.25) {
 45 |        _st = 1.0-vec2(1.0-_st.x,_st.y);
 46 |    }
 47 |    return _st;
 48 |}
 49 |
 50 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 51 |{
 52 |    p*=z;
 53 |    return fract(p);
 54 |}
 55 |
 56 |vec2 radialTile(vec2 _st, vec2 _vel, float _zoom){
 57 |  vec2 toExtreme = vec2(0.5)-_st;
 58 |  vec2 polar = vec2( (3.14+atan(toExtreme.y,toExtreme.x))/(2*3.14),   // Angle
 59 |                      log(length(toExtreme))*1.62*0.1);            // Radius
 60 |  polar *= _zoom;
 61 |
 62 |  polar.y += _vel.y;
 63 |  if (fract( polar.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 64 |    polar.x += _vel.x;
 65 |  } else {
 66 |    polar.x -= _vel.x;
 67 |  }
 68 |
 69 |  return fract(polar);
 70 |}
 71 |
 72 |float chaos (float timeX)
 73 |{
 74 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 75 |}
 76 |
 77 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 78 |{
 79 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 80 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 81 |
 82 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 83 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 84 |
 85 |  return pct0+pct1;
 86 |}
 87 |
 88 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 _st, float _zoom){
 89 |    _st *= _zoom;
 90 |    if (fract(_st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 91 |        _st.x += 0.5;
 92 |    }
 93 |    return fract(_st);
 94 |}
 95 |
 96 |float box(vec2 _st, vec2 _size){
 97 |    _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
 98 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),_st);
 99 |    uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-_st);
100 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
101 |}
102 |
103 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 _st, float _angle){
104 |  _st -= 0.5;
105 |  _st =  mat2(cos(_angle),-sin(_angle),
106 |              sin(_angle),cos(_angle)) * _st;
107 |  _st += 0.5;
108 |  return _st;
109 |}
110 |
111 |float circle(vec2 _st, float _radius){
112 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-_st;
113 |  return smoothstep(1.0-_radius,1.0-_radius+_radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
114 |}
115 |
116 |float box2(vec2 _st, vec2 _size, float _smoothEdges){
117 |  _size = vec2(0.5)-_size*0.5;
118 |  vec2 aa = vec2(_smoothEdges*0.5);
119 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,_st);
120 |  uv *= smoothstep(_size,_size+aa,vec2(1.0)-_st);
121 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
122 |}
123 |
124 |vec2 offset(vec2 _st, vec2 _offset){
125 |  vec2 uv;
126 |  if(_st.x>0.5){
127 |    uv.x = _st.x - 0.5;
128 |  } else {
129 |    uv.x = _st.x + 0.5;
130 |  } 
131 |  if(_st.y>0.5){
132 |    uv.y = _st.y - 0.5;
133 |  }else {
134 |    uv.y = _st.y + 0.5;
135 |  } 
136 |  return uv;
137 |}
138 |
139 |vec2 movingTiles(vec2 _st, float _zoom, float _speed){
140 |  _st *= _zoom;
141 |  float time = timeV*_speed;
142 |  if( fract(time)>0.5 ){
143 |    if (fract( _st.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
144 |      _st.x += fract(time)*2.0;
145 |    } else {
146 |      _st.x -= fract(time)*2.0;
147 |    } 
148 |  } else {
149 |    if (fract( _st.x * 0.5) > 0.5){
150 |      _st.y += fract(time)*2.0;
151 |    } else {
152 |        _st.y -= fract(time)*2.0;
153 |    } 
154 |  }
155 |  return fract(_st);
156 |}

158 |void main() { 
159 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
160 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
161 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
162 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
163 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
164 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
165 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
166 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
167 |
168 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
169 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
170 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
171 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
172 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
173 |
174 |    alpha*=10;
175 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
176 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
177 |
178 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
179 |
180 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
181 |    {
182 |    discard;
183 |    }
184 |  switch(int(swapColor))
185 |  {
186 |  case 0:
187 |    break;
188 |  case 1:
189 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
190 |    break;
191 |  case 2:
192 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
193 |    break;
194 |  case 3:
195 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
196 |    break;
197 |  case 4:
198 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
199 |    break;
200 |  case 5:
201 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
202 |    break;
203 |  case 6:
204 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
205 |    break;
206 |  default:
207 |    break;
208 |  };
209 |
210 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
211 |  if (flag)
212 |  {
213 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
214 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
215 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
216 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
217 |  switch(line)
218 |  {
219 |  case 0:
220 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
221 |    break;
222 |  case 1:
223 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
224 |    break;
225 |  case 2:
226 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
227 |    break;
228 |  case 3:
229 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
230 |    break;
231 |  default:
232 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
233 |    break;
234 |  };
235 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
236 |  };
237 |
238 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
239 |  vec2 ipos = vec2(0,0);
240 |  vec2 fpos = vec2(0,0);
241 |  vec2 tile = vec2(0,0);
242 |  float color= 0.0f;
243 |  switch (noiseIO)
244 |  {
245 |  case 0:
246 |    break;
247 |  case 1:
248 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
249 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
250 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
251 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
252 |    break;
253 |  case 2:
254 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
255 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
256 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
257 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
258 |    break;
259 |  case 3:
260 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
261 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
262 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
263 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
264 |    break;
265 |  case 4:
266 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
267 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
268 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
269 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
270 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
271 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
272 |    break;
273 |  case 5:
274 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
275 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
276 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF),0.01);
277 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01);
278 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
279 |    break;
280 |  case 6:
281 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
282 |    float angle = 3.14*0.25*cos(timeV*0.5);
283 |    float rows = 10;
284 |    if (fract(texCoordFrag.y * 0.5 * rows) > 0.5)
285 |    {
286 |      angle *= -1.0;
287 |    }
288 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,angle);
289 |    col2 *= 2.0;
290 |    float pct = (1.0+cos(3.14*col2.x))*0.5;

292 |    unit0.y = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
293 |    unit0.z = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
294 |    break;
295 |  case 7:
296 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*fract(timeV*0.1));
297 |    //col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
298 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(fract(timeV*0.5)),tilePPF+5);
299 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(-fract(timeV),0.0),tilePPF+2);
300 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF,1 - xPPF),0.01);
301 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF,1 - yPPF),0.01);
302 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF,1 - zPPF),0.01);
303 |    break;
304 |  case 8:
305 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*chaos(timeV));
306 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*chaos(timeV));
307 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*chaos(timeV));
308 |    break;
309 |  case 9:
310 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*random(col2));
311 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*random(col2));
312 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*random(col2));
313 |    break;
314 |  case 10:
315 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
316 |    ipos = floor(col2);
317 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*random( ipos ));
318 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*random( ipos ));
319 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*random( ipos ));
320 |    break;
321 |  case 11:
322 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
323 |    fpos = fract(col2);
324 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*fpos.x);
325 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*fpos.y);
326 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*0.01);
327 |    break;
328 |  case 12:
329 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
330 |    ipos = floor(col2);
331 |    fpos = fract(col2);
332 |    vec2 tile = truchetPattern(fpos, random( ipos ));
333 |    color = smoothstep(tile.x-0.3,tile.x,tile.y)-
334 |            smoothstep(tile.x,tile.x+0.3,tile.y);
335 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*color);
336 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*color);
337 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*color);
338 |    break;
339 |  case 13:
340 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
341 |    col2 = (col2-vec2(5.0))*(abs(sin(timeV*0.2))*5.);
342 |    col2.x += timeV*3.0;
343 |    ipos = floor(col2);
344 |    fpos = fract(col2);
345 |    tile = truchetPattern(fpos, random( ipos ));
346 |    color = (step(length(tile),0.6) -
347 |              step(length(tile),0.4) ) +
348 |             (step(length(tile-vec2(1.)),0.6) -
349 |              step(length(tile-vec2(1.)),0.4) );
350 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*color);
351 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*color);
352 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*color);
353 |    break;
354 |  case 13:
355 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
356 |    col2 = (col2-vec2(5.0))*(abs(sin(timeV*0.2))*5.);
357 |    col2.x += timeV*3.0;
358 |    ipos = floor(col2);

363 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*step(tile.x,tile.y));
364 |    break;
365 |  default:
366 |    break;
367 |  }

[Tue Apr 21 03:21:23 2020] ERR: [program.cpp (223)] Error compilando el shader:0(163) : error C1008: undefined variable "texUnit20"
0(164) : error C1008: undefined variable "texUnit21"
0(165) : error C1008: undefined variable "texUnit22"

Fragment shader: ../p5-2/pattern.frag
-------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |layout(location = 2) uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |
  5 |uniform int swapColor;
  6 |uniform float TVflag;
  7 |uniform float bright;
  8 |uniform float timeV;
  9 |uniform int noiseIO;
 10 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 11 |uniform int tilePPF;
 12 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 13 |
 14 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 15 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 16 |
 17 |out vec4 fragColor;
 18 |
 19 |float rand(float n){return fract(sin(n) * 43758.5453123);}
 20 |
 21 |float noiseOne(float p){
 22 |	float fl = floor(p);
 23 |  float fc = fract(p);
 24 |	return mix(rand(fl), rand(fl + 1.0), fc);
 25 |}
 26 |	
 27 |float random (vec2 st) {
 28 |    return fract(sin(dot(st.xy,
 29 |                         vec2(12.9898,78.233)))*
 30 |        43758.5453123);
 31 |}
 32 |
 33 |vec2 truchetPattern(in vec2 p, in float _index){
 34 |    _index = fract(((_index-0.5)*2.0));
 35 |    if (_index > 0.75) {
 36 |        p = vec2(1.0) - p;
 37 |    } else if (_index > 0.5) {
 38 |        p = vec2(1.0-p.x,p.y);
 39 |    } else if (_index > 0.25) {
 40 |        p = 1.0-vec2(1.0-p.x,p.y);
 41 |    }
 42 |    return p;
 43 |}
 44 |
 45 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 46 |{
 47 |    p*=z;
 48 |    return fract(p);
 49 |}
 50 |
 51 |vec2 radialTile(vec2 p, vec2 speed, float zoom){
 52 |  vec2 toExtreme = vec2(0.5)-p;
 53 |  vec2 polar = vec2( (3.14+atan(toExtreme.y,toExtreme.x))/(2*3.14),   // Angulo
 54 |                      log(length(toExtreme))*1.62*0.1);            // Radius
 55 |  polar *= zoom;
 56 |
 57 |  polar.y += speed.y;
 58 |  if (fract( polar.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 59 |    polar.x += speed.x;
 60 |  } else {
 61 |    polar.x -= speed.x;
 62 |  }
 63 |
 64 |  return fract(polar);
 65 |}
 66 |
 67 |float chaos (float timeX)
 68 |{
 69 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 70 |}
 71 |
 72 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 73 |{
 74 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 75 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 76 |
 77 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 78 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 79 |
 80 |  return pct0+pct1;
 81 |}
 82 |
 83 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 p, float zoom){
 84 |    p *= zoom;
 85 |    if (fract(p.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 86 |        p.x += 0.5;
 87 |    }
 88 |    return fract(p);
 89 |}
 90 |
 91 |float box(vec2 p, vec2 size){
 92 |    size = vec2(0.5)-size*0.5;
 93 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(size,size+vec2(0.0001),p);
 94 |    uv *= smoothstep(size,size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-p);
 95 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
 96 |}
 97 |
 98 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 p, float angle){
 99 |  p -= 0.5;
100 |  p =  mat2(cos(angle),-sin(angle),
101 |              sin(angle),cos(angle)) * p;
102 |  p += 0.5;
103 |  return p;
104 |}
105 |
106 |float circle(vec2 p, float radius){
107 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-p;
108 |  return smoothstep(1.0-radius,1.0-radius+radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
109 |}
110 |
111 |float box2(vec2 p, vec2 size, float smoothEdges){
112 |  size = vec2(0.5)-size*0.5;
113 |  vec2 aa = vec2(smoothEdges*0.5);
114 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(size,size+aa,p);
115 |  uv *= smoothstep(size,size+aa,vec2(1.0)-p);
116 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
117 |}
118 |
119 |vec2 offset(vec2 p, vec2 offset){
120 |  vec2 uv;
121 |  if(p.x>0.5){
122 |    uv.x = p.x - 0.5;
123 |  } else {
124 |    uv.x = p.x + 0.5;
125 |  } 
126 |  if(p.y>0.5){
127 |    uv.y = p.y - 0.5;
128 |  }else {
129 |    uv.y = p.y + 0.5;
130 |  } 
131 |  return uv;
132 |}
133 |
134 |vec2 movingTiles(vec2 p, float zoom, float speed){
135 |  p *= zoom;
136 |  float time = timeV*speed;
137 |  if( fract(time)>0.5 ){
138 |    if (fract( p.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
139 |      p.x += fract(time)*2.0;
140 |    } else {
141 |      p.x -= fract(time)*2.0;
142 |    } 
143 |  } else {
144 |    if (fract( p.x * 0.5) > 0.5){
145 |      p.y += fract(time)*2.0;
146 |    } else {
147 |        p.y -= fract(time)*2.0;
148 |    } 
149 |  }
150 |  return fract(p);
151 |}
152 |
153 |void main() { 
154 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
155 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
156 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
157 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
158 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
159 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
160 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
161 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
162 |
163 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
164 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
165 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
166 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
167 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
168 |
169 |    alpha*=10;
170 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
171 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
172 |
173 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
174 |
175 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
176 |    {
177 |    discard;
178 |    }
179 |  switch(int(swapColor))
180 |  {
181 |  case 0:
182 |    break;
183 |  case 1:
184 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
185 |    break;
186 |  case 2:
187 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
188 |    break;
189 |  case 3:
190 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
191 |    break;
192 |  case 4:
193 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
194 |    break;
195 |  case 5:
196 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
197 |    break;
198 |  case 6:
199 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
200 |    break;
201 |  default:
202 |    break;
203 |  };
204 |
205 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
206 |  if (flag)
207 |  {
208 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
209 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
210 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
211 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
212 |  switch(line)
213 |  {
214 |  case 0:
215 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
216 |    break;
217 |  case 1:
218 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
219 |    break;
220 |  case 2:
221 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
222 |    break;
223 |  case 3:
224 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
225 |    break;
226 |  default:
227 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
228 |    break;
229 |  };
230 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
231 |  };
232 |
233 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
234 |  vec2 ipos = vec2(0,0);
235 |  vec2 fpos = vec2(0,0);
236 |  vec2 tile = vec2(0,0);
237 |  float color= 0.0f;
238 |  switch (noiseIO)
239 |  {
240 |  case 0:
241 |    break;
242 |  case 1:
243 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
244 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
245 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
246 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
247 |    break;
248 |  case 2:
249 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
250 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
251 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
252 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
253 |    break;
254 |  case 3:
255 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
256 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
257 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
258 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
259 |    break;
260 |  case 4:
261 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
262 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
263 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
264 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
265 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
266 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
267 |    break;
268 |  case 5:
269 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
270 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
271 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF),0.01);
272 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01);
273 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
274 |    break;
275 |  case 6:
276 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
277 |    float angle = 3.14*0.25*cos(timeV*0.5);
278 |    float rows = 10;
279 |    if (fract(texCoordFrag.y * 0.5 * rows) > 0.5)
280 |    {
281 |      angle *= -1.0;
282 |    }
283 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,angle);
284 |    col2 *= 2.0;
285 |    float pct = (1.0+cos(3.14*col2.x))*0.5;
286 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
287 |    unit0.y = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
288 |    unit0.z = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
289 |    break;
290 |  case 7:
291 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*fract(timeV*0.1));
292 |    //col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
293 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(fract(timeV*0.5)),tilePPF+5);
294 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(-fract(timeV),0.0),tilePPF+2);
295 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF,1 - xPPF),0.01);
296 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF,1 - yPPF),0.01);
297 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF,1 - zPPF),0.01);
298 |    break;
299 |  case 8:
300 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*chaos(timeV));
301 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*chaos(timeV));
302 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*chaos(timeV));
303 |    break;
304 |  case 9:
305 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*random(col2));
306 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*random(col2));
307 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*random(col2));
308 |    break;
309 |  case 10:
310 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
311 |    ipos = floor(col2);
312 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*random( ipos ));
313 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*random( ipos ));
314 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*random( ipos ));
315 |    break;
316 |  case 11:
317 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
318 |    fpos = fract(col2);
319 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*fpos.x);
320 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*fpos.y);
321 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*0.01);
322 |    break;
323 |  case 12:
324 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
325 |    ipos = floor(col2);
326 |    fpos = fract(col2);
327 |    vec2 tile = truchetPattern(fpos, random( ipos ));
328 |    color = smoothstep(tile.x-0.3,tile.x,tile.y)-
329 |            smoothstep(tile.x,tile.x+0.3,tile.y);
330 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*color);
331 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*color);
332 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*color);
333 |    break;
334 |  case 13:
335 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
336 |    col2 = (col2-vec2(5.0))*(abs(sin(timeV*0.2))*5.);
337 |    col2.x += timeV*3.0;
338 |    ipos = floor(col2);
339 |    fpos = fract(col2);
340 |    tile = truchetPattern(fpos, random( ipos ));
341 |    color = (step(length(tile),0.6) -
342 |              step(length(tile),0.4) ) +
343 |             (step(length(tile-vec2(1.)),0.6) -
344 |              step(length(tile-vec2(1.)),0.4) );
345 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*color);
346 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*color);
347 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*color);
348 |    break;
349 |  case 14:
350 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
351 |    col2 = (col2-vec2(5.0))*(abs(sin(timeV*0.2))*5.);
352 |    col2.x += timeV*3.0;
353 |    ipos = floor(col2);
354 |    fpos = fract(col2);
355 |    tile = truchetPattern(fpos, random( ipos ));
356 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*step(tile.x,tile.y));
357 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*step(tile.x,tile.y));
358 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*step(tile.x,tile.y));
359 |    break;
360 |  default:
361 |    break;
362 |  }
363 |
364 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
365 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
366 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
367 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
368 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
369 |}
370 |
