Fragment shader: ../p5-2/textureReplace.frag
--------------------------------------------
  1 |#version 450 core
  2 |
  3 |uniform sampler2D texUnit0;
  4 |
  5 |uniform int swapColor;
  6 |uniform float TVflag;
  7 |uniform float bright;
  8 |uniform float timeV;
  9 |uniform int noiseIO;
 10 |uniform bool alphaTime;
 11 |uniform int tilePPF;
 12 |uniform float zPPF, yPPF, xPPF;
 13 |
 14 |in vec2 texCoordFrag;
 15 |in vec3 colorFrag;
 16 |
 17 |out vec4 fragColor;
 18 |
 19 |float rand(float n){return fract(sin(n) * 43758.5453123);}
 20 |
 21 |float noiseOne(float p){
 22 |	float fl = floor(p);
 23 |  float fc = fract(p);
 24 |	return mix(rand(fl), rand(fl + 1.0), fc);
 25 |}
 26 |	
 27 |float random (vec2 st) {
 28 |    return fract(sin(dot(st.xy,
 29 |                         vec2(12.9898,78.233)))*
 30 |        43758.5453123);
 31 |}
 32 |
 33 |vec2 truchetPattern(in vec2 p, in float _index){
 34 |    _index = fract(((_index-0.5)*2.0));
 35 |    if (_index > 0.75) {
 36 |        p = vec2(1.0) - p;
 37 |    } else if (_index > 0.5) {
 38 |        p = vec2(1.0-p.x,p.y);
 39 |    } else if (_index > 0.25) {
 40 |        p = 1.0-vec2(1.0-p.x,p.y);
 41 |    }
 42 |    return p;
 43 |}
 44 |
 45 |vec2 tileF (vec2 p, float z)
 46 |{
 47 |    p*=z;
 48 |    return fract(p);
 49 |}
 50 |
 51 |vec2 radialTile(vec2 p, vec2 speed, float zoom){
 52 |  vec2 toExtreme = vec2(0.5)-p;
 53 |  vec2 polar = vec2( (3.14+atan(toExtreme.y,toExtreme.x))/(2*3.14),   // Angulo
 54 |                      log(length(toExtreme))*1.62*0.1);            // Radius
 55 |  polar *= zoom;
 56 |
 57 |  polar.y += speed.y;
 58 |  if (fract( polar.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 59 |    polar.x += speed.x;
 60 |  } else {
 61 |    polar.x -= speed.x;
 62 |  }
 63 |
 64 |  return fract(polar);
 65 |}
 66 |
 67 |float chaos (float timeX)
 68 |{
 69 |    return 3.756918*timeX*(1-timeX);
 70 |}
 71 |
 72 |float star (vec2 p, float w)
 73 |{
 74 |  float pct0 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,p.y);
 75 |  pct0 *= 1.0-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,p.y);
 76 |
 77 |  float pct1 = smoothstep(p.x-w,p.x,1.0-p.y);
 78 |  pct1 *= 1.-smoothstep(p.x,p.x+w,1.0-p.y);
 79 |
 80 |  return pct0+pct1;
 81 |}
 82 |
 83 |vec2 brickTile(vec2 p, float zoom){
 84 |    p *= zoom;
 85 |    if (fract(p.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
 86 |        p.x += 0.5;
 87 |    }
 88 |    return fract(p);
 89 |}
 90 |
 91 |float box(vec2 p, vec2 size){
 92 |    size = vec2(0.5)-size*0.5;
 93 |    vec2 uv = smoothstep(size,size+vec2(0.0001),p);
 94 |    uv *= smoothstep(size,size+vec2(0.0001),vec2(1.0)-p);
 95 |    return uv.x*uv.y;
 96 |}
 97 |
 98 |vec2 rotate2D(vec2 p, float angle){
 99 |  p -= 0.5;
100 |  p =  mat2(cos(angle),-sin(angle),
101 |              sin(angle),cos(angle)) * p;
102 |  p += 0.5;
103 |  return p;
104 |}
105 |
106 |float circle(vec2 p, float radius){
107 |  vec2 pos = vec2(0.5)-p;
108 |  return smoothstep(1.0-radius,1.0-radius+radius*0.2,1.-dot(pos,pos)*3.14);
109 |}
110 |
111 |float box2(vec2 p, vec2 size, float smoothEdges){
112 |  size = vec2(0.5)-size*0.5;
113 |  vec2 aa = vec2(smoothEdges*0.5);
114 |  vec2 uv = smoothstep(size,size+aa,p);
115 |  uv *= smoothstep(size,size+aa,vec2(1.0)-p);
116 |  return uv.x*uv.y;
117 |}
118 |
119 |vec2 offset(vec2 p, vec2 offset){
120 |  vec2 uv;
121 |  if(p.x>0.5){
122 |    uv.x = p.x - 0.5;
123 |  } else {
124 |    uv.x = p.x + 0.5;
125 |  } 
126 |  if(p.y>0.5){
127 |    uv.y = p.y - 0.5;
128 |  }else {
129 |    uv.y = p.y + 0.5;
130 |  } 
131 |  return uv;
132 |}
133 |
134 |vec2 movingTiles(vec2 p, float zoom, float speed){
135 |  p *= zoom;
136 |  float time = timeV*speed;
137 |  if( fract(time)>0.5 ){
138 |    if (fract( p.y * 0.5) > 0.5){
139 |      p.x += fract(time)*2.0;
140 |    } else {
141 |      p.x -= fract(time)*2.0;
142 |    } 
143 |  } else {
144 |    if (fract( p.x * 0.5) > 0.5){
145 |      p.y += fract(time)*2.0;
146 |    } else {
147 |        p.y -= fract(time)*2.0;
148 |    } 
149 |  }
150 |  return fract(p);
151 |}
152 |
153 |void main() { 
154 |    vec4 colorM = vec4(colorFrag,1.0f);
155 |    vec4 unit0 = texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
156 |    vec3 bw = vec3(0.3f,0.59f,0.11f);
157 |    vec3 gry = vec3(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f);
158 |    vec3 red = vec3(1.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
159 |    vec3 blc = vec3(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f);
160 |    vec3 wht = vec3(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
161 |    float alpha = dot(unit0.xyz,bw);
162 |
163 |    vec4 unit20 = texture(texUnit20, texCoordFrag);
164 |    vec4 unit21 = texture(texUnit21, texCoordFrag);
165 |    vec4 unit22 = texture(texUnit22, texCoordFrag);
166 |    vec4 unit23 = texture(texUnit23, texCoordFrag);
167 |    vec4 unit24 = texture(texUnit24, texCoordFrag);
168 |
169 |    alpha*=10;
170 |    alpha=alpha>1.0f?1.0f:alpha;
171 |    alpha=alpha<0.0f?0.0f:alpha;
172 |
173 |    float sum = unit0.x+unit0.y+unit0.z;
174 |
175 |    if (sum<=0.03||unit0.xyz==red||unit0.xyz==blc)
176 |    {
177 |    discard;
178 |    }
179 |  switch(int(swapColor))
180 |  {
181 |  case 0:
182 |    break;
183 |  case 1:
184 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,1),1);
185 |    break;
186 |  case 2:
187 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,1,0),1);
188 |    break;
189 |  case 3:
190 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(1,0,0),1);
191 |    break;
192 |  case 4:
193 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.2),1);
194 |    break;
195 |  case 5:
196 |    unit0*=vec4(vec3(0.5,0.5,0.5),1);
197 |    break;
198 |  case 6:
199 |    unit0*=vec4(bw,1);
200 |    break;
201 |  default:
202 |    break;
203 |  };
204 |
205 |  bool flag = bool(TVflag);
206 |  if (flag)
207 |  {
208 |  unit0=texture(texUnit0, texCoordFrag);
209 |  float convertedColor = dot(unit0.xyz, bw);
210 |  vec3 scanlines = vec3(0.2, 0.8, 1.0);
211 |  int line = int(gl_FragCoord.y)%4;
212 |  switch(line)
213 |  {
214 |  case 0:
215 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
216 |    break;
217 |  case 1:
218 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.x;
219 |    break;
220 |  case 2:
221 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.y;
222 |    break;
223 |  case 3:
224 |    convertedColor*=scanlines.z;
225 |    break;
226 |  default:
227 |    convertedColor*=1.0;
228 |    break;
229 |  };
230 |  unit0=vec4(vec3(convertedColor),1);
231 |  };
232 |
233 |  vec2 col2 = texCoordFrag;
234 |  vec2 ipos = vec2(0,0);
235 |  vec2 fpos = vec2(0,0);
236 |  vec2 tile = vec2(0,0);
237 |  float color= 0.0f;
238 |  switch (noiseIO)
239 |  {
240 |  case 0:
241 |    break;
242 |  case 1:
243 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
244 |    unit0.x = star(col2,xPPF);
245 |    unit0.y = star(col2,yPPF);
246 |    unit0.z = star(col2,zPPF);
247 |    break;
248 |  case 2:
249 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
250 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
251 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
252 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
253 |    break;
254 |  case 3:
255 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
256 |    unit0.x = box(col2,vec2(xPPF));
257 |    unit0.y = box(col2,vec2(yPPF));
258 |    unit0.z = box(col2,vec2(zPPF));
259 |    break;
260 |  case 4:
261 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
262 |    vec2 offsetCol2 = offset(col2,vec2(0.5));
263 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
264 |    unit0.x = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
265 |    unit0.y = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
266 |    unit0.z = box2(offsetCol2,vec2(xPPF),0.01) - box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01) + 2.*box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
267 |    break;
268 |  case 5:
269 |    col2 = tileF(col2, tilePPF);
270 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*0.25);
271 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF),0.01);
272 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF),0.01);
273 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF),0.01);
274 |    break;
275 |  case 6:
276 |    col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
277 |    float angle = 3.14*0.25*cos(timeV*0.5);
278 |    float rows = 10;
279 |    if (fract(texCoordFrag.y * 0.5 * rows) > 0.5)
280 |    {
281 |      angle *= -1.0;
282 |    }
283 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,angle);
284 |    col2 *= 2.0;
285 |    float pct = (1.0+cos(3.14*col2.x))*0.5;
286 |    unit0.x = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
287 |    unit0.y = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
288 |    unit0.z = 1.0-smoothstep( xPPF,yPPF, pow(pct,col2.y) ) * 1.0-smoothstep( yPPF,zPPF, pow(pct,2.0-col2.y) );
289 |    break;
290 |  case 7:
291 |    col2 = rotate2D(col2,3.14*fract(timeV*0.1));
292 |    //col2 = brickTile(col2,tilePPF);
293 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(fract(timeV*0.5)),tilePPF+5);
294 |    col2 = radialTile(col2,vec2(-fract(timeV),0.0),tilePPF+2);
295 |    unit0.x = box2(col2,vec2(xPPF,1 - xPPF),0.01);
296 |    unit0.y = box2(col2,vec2(yPPF,1 - yPPF),0.01);
297 |    unit0.z = box2(col2,vec2(zPPF,1 - zPPF),0.01);
298 |    break;
299 |  case 8:
300 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*chaos(timeV));
301 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*chaos(timeV));
302 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*chaos(timeV));
303 |    break;
304 |  case 9:
305 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*random(col2));
306 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*random(col2));
307 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*random(col2));
308 |    break;
309 |  case 10:
310 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
311 |    ipos = floor(col2);
312 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*random( ipos ));
313 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*random( ipos ));
314 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*random( ipos ));
315 |    break;
316 |  case 11:
317 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
318 |    fpos = fract(col2);
319 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*fpos.x);
320 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*fpos.y);
321 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*0.01);
322 |    break;
323 |  case 12:
324 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
325 |    ipos = floor(col2);
326 |    fpos = fract(col2);
327 |    vec2 tile = truchetPattern(fpos, random( ipos ));
328 |    color = smoothstep(tile.x-0.3,tile.x,tile.y)-
329 |            smoothstep(tile.x,tile.x+0.3,tile.y);
330 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*color);
331 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*color);
332 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*color);
333 |    break;
334 |  case 13:
335 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
336 |    col2 = (col2-vec2(5.0))*(abs(sin(timeV*0.2))*5.);
337 |    col2.x += timeV*3.0;
338 |    ipos = floor(col2);
339 |    fpos = fract(col2);
340 |    tile = truchetPattern(fpos, random( ipos ));
341 |    color = (step(length(tile),0.6) -
342 |              step(length(tile),0.4) ) +
343 |             (step(length(tile-vec2(1.)),0.6) -
344 |              step(length(tile-vec2(1.)),0.4) );
345 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*color);
346 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*color);
347 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*color);
348 |    break;
349 |  case 14:
350 |    col2 *= tilePPF;
351 |    col2 = (col2-vec2(5.0))*(abs(sin(timeV*0.2))*5.);
352 |    col2.x += timeV*3.0;
353 |    ipos = floor(col2);
354 |    fpos = fract(col2);
355 |    tile = truchetPattern(fpos, random( ipos ));
356 |    unit0.x = min (1, xPPF*step(tile.x,tile.y));
357 |    unit0.y = min (1, yPPF*step(tile.x,tile.y));
358 |    unit0.z = min (1, zPPF*step(tile.x,tile.y));
359 |    break;
360 |  default:
361 |    break;
362 |  }
363 |
364 |  unit0.x=min(1, unit0.x*bright);
365 |  unit0.y=min(1, unit0.y*bright);
366 |  unit0.z=min(1, unit0.z*bright);
367 |  if (alphaTime) alpha = 1;
368 |  fragColor = vec4(unit0.xyz,alpha);
369 |}
370 |
